6477729Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring GetReplacement(Match m) {Di2015NewLine    // Get the matched string.Di2015NewLine    string x = m.ToString().Replace("=\\r\\n","");Di2015NewLine    return Lookup[x];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLinefile = Regex.Replace(file, @"\\[.*?\\]", GetReplacement, RegexOptions.Singleline);Di2015NewLine
6477729Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<string> Chunk(TextReader reader) {Di2015NewLine    char[] chars = new char[MaxBufferSize];Di2015NewLine    string buffer = "";Di2015NewLine    int charsRead;Di2015NewLine    while ((charsRead = reader.ReadBlock(chars, 0, MaxBufferSize)) > 0) {Di2015NewLine        buffer = buffer + new string(chars,0,charsRead);Di2015NewLine        int indexOfOpenBracket;Di2015NewLine        if((indexOfOpenBracket = buffer.IndexOf('[')) == -1) {Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(buffer)) yield return buffer;Di2015NewLine            buffer = "";Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (indexOfOpenBracket!=-1) {Di2015NewLine            string outsideBrackets = buffer.Substring(0, indexOfOpenBracket);Di2015NewLine            if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(outsideBrackets)) yield return outsideBrackets;Di2015NewLine            buffer = buffer.Substring(indexOfOpenBracket + 1);Di2015NewLine            int indexOfCloseBracket = buffer.IndexOf(']');Di2015NewLine            if (indexOfCloseBracket != -1) {Di2015NewLine                string insideBrackets = buffer.Substring(0, indexOfCloseBracket);Di2015NewLine                buffer = buffer.Substring(indexOfCloseBracket + 1);Di2015NewLine                yield return DoLookup(insideBrackets);Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                buffer = '[' + buffer;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            indexOfOpenBracket = buffer.IndexOf('[');Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    yield return buffer;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static void BufferReplace(Stream input, Stream output) {Di2015NewLine    StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(input);Di2015NewLine    StreamWriter writer = new StreamWriter(output);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var chunk in Chunk(reader)) {Di2015NewLine        writer.Write(chunk);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6480010Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ParserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Regex TemplateRegex =Di2015NewLine        new Regex(@"\\[%(?<field>[^]]+)%\\](?<delim>[^[]+)?");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    readonly List<string> m_fields = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    private readonly Regex m_textRegex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Parser(string template)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var textRegexString = '^' + TemplateRegex.Replace(template, Evaluator) + '$';Di2015NewLine        m_textRegex = new Regex(textRegexString);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string Evaluator(Match match)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // add field name to collection and create regex for the fieldDi2015NewLine        var fieldName = match.Groups["field"].Value;Di2015NewLine        m_fields.Add(fieldName);Di2015NewLine        string result = "(.*?)";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // add delimiter to the regex, if it existsDi2015NewLine        // TODO: check, that only last field doesn't have delimiterDi2015NewLine        var delimGroup = match.Groups["delim"];Di2015NewLine        if (delimGroup.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string delim = delimGroup.Value;Di2015NewLine            result += Regex.Escape(delim);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IDictionary<string, string> Parse(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var match = m_textRegex.Match(text);Di2015NewLine        var groups = match.Groups;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result = new Dictionary<string, string>(m_fields.Count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < m_fields.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            result.Add(m_fields[i], groups[i + 1].Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6484831Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic object call(params object[] input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ParameterInfo[] parameters = Method.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine    bool hasParams = false;Di2015NewLine    if (parameters.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        hasParams = parameters[parameters.Length - 1].GetCustomAttributes(typeof(ParamArrayAttribute), false).Length > 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (hasParams)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int lastParamPosition = parameters.Length - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object[] realParams = new object[parameters.Length];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < lastParamPosition; i++)Di2015NewLine            realParams[i] = input[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type paramsType = parameters[lastParamPosition].ParameterType.GetElementType();Di2015NewLine        Array extra = Array.CreateInstance(paramsType, input.Length - lastParamPosition);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < extra.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            extra.SetValue(input[i + lastParamPosition], i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        realParams[lastParamPosition] = extra;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        input = realParams;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Method.Invoke(Target, input);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6486405Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MyStruct b1 = new MyStruct(1); // to be considered trueDi2015NewLine        MyStruct b2 = new MyStruct(-1); // to be considered falseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine((b1 && b2) ? "TRUE" : "FALSE");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine((b2 && b1) ? "TRUE" : "FALSE");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine((b1 || b2) ? "TRUE" : "FALSE");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine((b2 || b1) ? "TRUE" : "FALSE");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic struct MyStructDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int _i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyStruct(int i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _i = i;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator true(MyStruct ms)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("op true on {0}", ms);Di2015NewLine        return ms._i > 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator false(MyStruct ms)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("op false on {0}", ms);Di2015NewLine        return ms._i <= 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static MyStruct operator &(MyStruct lhs, MyStruct rhs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("op & on {0} {1}", lhs, rhs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (lhs)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return rhs;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new MyStruct(-1); //-1 is falseDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static MyStruct operator |(MyStruct lhs, MyStruct rhs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("op & on {0} {1}", lhs, rhs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (lhs)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return lhs;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return rhs;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this._i.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6486952Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public class ADi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      B m_b = new B();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      public void RegisterEventHandlers()Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         m_b.TheEvent += new EventHandler(Handler_TheEvent);Di2015NewLine         m_b.TheEvent += new EventHandler(AnotherHandler_TheEvent);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      public A()Di2015NewLine      { Di2015NewLine         m_b.TheEvent += new EventHandler(InitialHandler_TheEvent);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      void InitialHandler_TheEvent(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine      { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      void Handler_TheEvent(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine      { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      void AnotherHandler_TheEvent(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine      { }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public class BDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      public event EventHandler TheEvent;Di2015NewLine      //{Di2015NewLine      //   //Note that if we declared TheEvent without the add/remove methods, theDi2015NewLine      //   //following would still generated internally and the underlying memberDi2015NewLine      //   //(here m_theEvent) can be accessed via Reflection. The automaticallyDi2015NewLine      //   //generated version has a private field with the same name as the eventDi2015NewLine      //   //(i.e. "TheEvent")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //   add { m_theEvent += value; }Di2015NewLine      //   remove { m_theEvent -= value; }Di2015NewLine      //}Di2015NewLine      //EventHandler m_theEvent; //"TheEvent" if we don't implement add/removeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //The following shows how the event can be invoked using the underlying multicast delegate.Di2015NewLine      //We use this knowledge when invoking via reflection (of course, normally we just writeDi2015NewLine      //if (TheEvent != null) TheEvent(this, EventArgs.Empty)Di2015NewLine      public void ExampleInvokeTheEvent()Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         Delegate[] dels = TheEvent.GetInvocationList();Di2015NewLine         foreach (Delegate del in dels)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            MethodInfo method = del.Method;Di2015NewLine            //This does the same as ThisEvent(this, EventArgs.Empty) for a single registered targetDi2015NewLine            method.Invoke(this, new object[] { EventArgs.Empty });Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public class TestDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      List<Delegate> FindRegisteredDelegates(A instanceRegisteringEvents, B instanceWithEventHandler, string sEventName)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         A a = instanceRegisteringEvents;Di2015NewLine         B b = instanceWithEventHandler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //Lets assume that we know that we are looking for a private instance field with name sEventName ("TheEvent"), Di2015NewLine         //i.e the event handler does not implement add/remove.Di2015NewLine         //(otherwise we would need more reflection to determine what we are looking for)Di2015NewLine         BindingFlags filter = BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //Lets assume that TheEvent does not implement the add and remove methods, in which caseDi2015NewLine         //the name of the relevant field is just the same as the event itselfDi2015NewLine         string sName = sEventName; //("TheEvent")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         FieldInfo fieldTheEvent = b.GetType().GetField(sName, filter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //The field that we get has type EventHandler and can be invoked as in ExampleInvokeTheEventDi2015NewLine         EventHandler eh = (EventHandler)fieldTheEvent.GetValue(b);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //If the event handler is null then nobody has registered with it yet (just return an empty list)Di2015NewLine         if (eh == null) return new List<Delegate>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         List<Delegate> dels = new List<Delegate>(eh.GetInvocationList());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //Only return those elements in the invokation list whose target is a.Di2015NewLine         return dels.FindAll(delegate(Delegate del) { return Object.ReferenceEquals(del.Target, a); });Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      public void Run()Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         A a = new A();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //We would need to check the set of delegates returned before we call thisDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //Lets assume we know how to find the all instances of B that A has registered withDi2015NewLine         //For know, lets assume there is just one in the field m_b of A.Di2015NewLine         FieldInfo fieldB = a.GetType().GetField("m_b", BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLine         B b = (B)fieldB.GetValue(a);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //Now we can find out how many times a.RegisterEventHandlers is registered with bDi2015NewLine         List<Delegate> delsBefore = FindRegisteredDelegates(a, b, "TheEvent");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         a.RegisterEventHandlers();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         List<Delegate> delsAfter = FindRegisteredDelegates(a, b, "TheEvent");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         List<Delegate> delsAdded = new List<Delegate>();Di2015NewLine         foreach (Delegate delAfter in delsAfter)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            bool inBefore = false;Di2015NewLine            foreach (Delegate delBefore in delsBefore)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               if ((delBefore.Method == delAfter.Method)Di2015NewLine                  && (Object.ReferenceEquals(delBefore.Target, delAfter.Target)))Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                  //NOTE: The check for Object.ReferenceEquals(delBefore.Target, delAfter.Target) above is not necessary Di2015NewLine                  //     here since we defined FindRegisteredDelegates to only return those for which .Taget == a)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  inBefore = true;Di2015NewLine                  break;Di2015NewLine               }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (!inBefore) delsAdded.Add(delAfter);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         Debug.WriteLine("Handlers added to b.TheEvent in a.RegisterEventHandlers:");Di2015NewLine         foreach (Delegate del in delsAdded)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine(del.Method.Name);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine

6489030Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace IntPairArrayParserDemoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var input = "2:{{2,10},{6,4}}";Di2015NewLine            ParseAndPrintArray(input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var anotherInput = "2  : { { 2 , 10 } , { 6 , 4 } }";Di2015NewLine            ParseAndPrintArray(anotherInput);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void ParseAndPrintArray(string input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Parsing array {0}...", input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var array = IntPairArrayParser.Parse(input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var pairCount = array.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < pairCount; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Pair found: {0},{1}", array[i, 0], array[i, 1]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static class IntPairArrayParserDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static int[,] Parse(string input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(input)) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("input");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // parse array length from stringDi2015NewLine            var length = ParseLength(input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // create the array that will hold all the parsed elementsDi2015NewLine            var result = new int[length, 2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // parse array elements from inputDi2015NewLine            ParseAndStoreElements(input, result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void ParseAndStoreElements(string input, int[,] array)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // get the length of the first dimension of the arrayDi2015NewLine            var expectedElementCount = array.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // parse array elementsDi2015NewLine            var elementMatches = Regex.Matches(input, @"{\\s*(\\d+)\\s*,\\s*(\\d+)\\s*}");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // validate that the number of elements present in input is correntDi2015NewLine            if (expectedElementCount != elementMatches.Count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var errorMessage = string.Format("Array should have {0} elements. It actually has {1} elements.", expectedElementCount, elementMatches.Count);Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException(errorMessage, "input");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // parse array elements from input into arrayDi2015NewLine            for (var elementIndex = 0; elementIndex < expectedElementCount; elementIndex++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ParseAndStoreElement(elementMatches[elementIndex], elementIndex, array);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void ParseAndStoreElement(Match match, int index, int[,] array)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // parse first and second element values from the match foundDi2015NewLine            var first = int.Parse(match.Groups[1].Value);Di2015NewLine            var second = int.Parse(match.Groups[2].Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            array[index, 0] = first;Di2015NewLine            array[index, 1] = second;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static int ParseLength(string input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // get the length from input and parse it as intDi2015NewLine            var lengthMatch = Regex.Match(input, @"(\\d+)\\s*:");Di2015NewLine            return int.Parse(lengthMatch.Groups[1].Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6489163Di2015UniqueSeparator        private static void GetCount(int[,] Positions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<int> x = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine            List<int> y = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < Positions.Length/2; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                x.Add(Positions[i, 0]);Di2015NewLine                y.Add(Positions[i, 1]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            int result = (x.Distinct().Count() * 8) + (y.Distinct().Count() * 8);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
6489163Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void GetCount(int[,] Positions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var range = Enumerable.Range(0, Positions.Length / 2);Di2015NewLine        var result = (range.Select(i => Positions[i, 0]).Distinct().Count() * 8) +Di2015NewLine                     (range.Select(i => Positions[i, 1]).Distinct().Count() * 8);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6489561Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void GetBuildingCount1(int No, int[,] Positions)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var lstRows = new HashSet<int>();Di2015NewLine    var lstCols = new HashSet<int>();           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get the unique rows and columnsDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < Positions.Length / 2; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lstRows.Add(Positions[i, 0]);Di2015NewLine        lstCols.Add(Positions[i, 1]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var count = (lstRows.Count + lstCols.Count) * 8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var output = No-count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(output);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6489561Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void GetBuildingCount1(int No, int[,] Positions)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var rows = Positions.Cast<int>().Where((p, i) => i % 2 == 0).Distinct().Count();Di2015NewLine    var cols = Positions.Cast<int>().Where((p, i) => i % 2 == 1).Distinct().Count();Di2015NewLine    var result = No - (rows + cols) * 8;Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(result);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6491634Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IsFileInUse(string fileFullPath, bool throwIfNotExists)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (System.IO.File.Exists(fileFullPath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //if this does not throw exception then the file is not use by another programDi2015NewLine            using (FileStream fileStream = File.OpenWrite(fileFullPath))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (fileStream == null)Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (!throwIfNotExists)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new FileNotFoundException("Specified path is not exsists", fileFullPath);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6491712Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport numpy as npDi2015NewLineimport numpy.linalg as laDi2015NewLineimport scipy.optimize as optDi2015NewLineimport itertools as itDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#Cardinal directionsDi2015NewLinedirs = [ [1,0,0], [0,1,0], [0,0,1] ]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#Vertices of cubeDi2015NewLinecube_verts = [ np.array([x, y, z])Di2015NewLine    for x in range(2)Di2015NewLine    for y in range(2)Di2015NewLine    for z in range(2) ]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#Edges of cubeDi2015NewLinecube_edges = [ Di2015NewLine    [ k for (k,v) in enumerate(cube_verts) if v[i] == a and v[j] == b ]Di2015NewLine    for a in range(2)Di2015NewLine    for b in range(2)Di2015NewLine    for i in range(3) Di2015NewLine    for j in range(3) if i != j ]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#Use non-linear root finding to compute intersection pointDi2015NewLinedef estimate_hermite(f, df, v0, v1):Di2015NewLine    t0 = opt.brentq(lambda t : f((1.-t)*v0 + t*v1), 0, 1)Di2015NewLine    x0 = (1.-t0)*v0 + t0*v1Di2015NewLine    return (x0, df(x0))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#Input:Di2015NewLine# f = implicit functionDi2015NewLine# df = gradient of fDi2015NewLine# nc = resolutionDi2015NewLinedef dual_contour(f, df, nc):Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #Compute verticesDi2015NewLine    dc_verts = []Di2015NewLine    vindex   = {}Di2015NewLine    for x,y,z in it.product(range(nc), range(nc), range(nc)):Di2015NewLine        o = np.array([x,y,z])Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #Get signs for cubeDi2015NewLine        cube_signs = [ f(o+v)>0 for v in cube_verts ]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if all(cube_signs) or not any(cube_signs):Di2015NewLine            continueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #Estimate hermite dataDi2015NewLine        h_data = [ estimate_hermite(f, df, o+cube_verts[e[0]], o+cube_verts[e[1]]) Di2015NewLine            for e in cube_edges if cube_signs[e[0]] != cube_signs[e[1]] ]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #Solve qef to get vertexDi2015NewLine        A = [ n for p,n in h_data ]Di2015NewLine        b = [ np.dot(p,n) for p,n in h_data ]Di2015NewLine        v, residue, rank, s = la.lstsq(A, b)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #Throw out failed solutionsDi2015NewLine        if la.norm(v-o) > 2:Di2015NewLine            continueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #Emit one vertex per every cube that crossesDi2015NewLine        vindex[ tuple(o) ] = len(dc_verts)Di2015NewLine        dc_verts.append(v)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #Construct facesDi2015NewLine    dc_faces = []Di2015NewLine    for x,y,z in it.product(range(nc), range(nc), range(nc)):Di2015NewLine        if not (x,y,z) in vindex:Di2015NewLine            continueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #Emit one face per each edge that crossesDi2015NewLine        o = np.array([x,y,z])   Di2015NewLine        for i in range(3):Di2015NewLine            for j in range(i):Di2015NewLine                if tuple(o + dirs[i]) in vindex and tuple(o + dirs[j]) in vindex and tuple(o + dirs[i] + dirs[j]) in vindex:Di2015NewLine                    dc_faces.append( [vindex[tuple(o)], vindex[tuple(o+dirs[i])], vindex[tuple(o+dirs[j])]] )Di2015NewLine                    dc_faces.append( [vindex[tuple(o+dirs[i]+dirs[j])], vindex[tuple(o+dirs[j])], vindex[tuple(o+dirs[i])]] )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return dc_verts, dc_facesDi2015NewLine
6491712Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport enthought.mayavi.mlab as mlabDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinecenter = np.array([16,16,16])Di2015NewLineradius = 10Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef test_f(x):Di2015NewLine    d = x-centerDi2015NewLine    return np.dot(d,d) - radius**2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef test_df(x):Di2015NewLine    d = x-centerDi2015NewLine    return d / sqrt(np.dot(d,d))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineverts, tris = dual_contour(f, df, n)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemlab.triangular_mesh( Di2015NewLine            [ v[0] for v in verts ],Di2015NewLine            [ v[1] for v in verts ],Di2015NewLine            [ v[2] for v in verts ],Di2015NewLine            tris)Di2015NewLine

6493436Di2015UniqueSeparator public class CustomDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string item; //will hold the itemDi2015NewLine        Timer timer; //will hanlde the expiryDi2015NewLine        List<Custom> refofMainList; //will be used to remove the item once it is expiredDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Custom(string yourItem, int milisec, List<Custom> refOfList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            refofMainList = refOfList;Di2015NewLine            item = yourItem;Di2015NewLine            timer = new Timer (milisec);Di2015NewLine            timer.Elapsed += new ElapsedEventHandler(Elapsed_Event);Di2015NewLine            timer.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Elapsed_Event(object sender, ElapsedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            timer.Elapsed -= new ElapsedEventHandler(Elapsed_Event);Di2015NewLine            refofMainList.Remove(this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

hObject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static bool LaunchProcessAsUser(string cmdLine, IntPtr token, IntPtr envBlock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool result = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var pi = new PROCESS_INFORMATION();Di2015NewLine            var saProcess = new SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES();Di2015NewLine            var saThread = new SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES();Di2015NewLine            saProcess.nLength = (uint) Marshal.SizeOf(saProcess);Di2015NewLine            saThread.nLength = (uint) Marshal.SizeOf(saThread);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var si = new STARTUPINFO();Di2015NewLine            si.cb = (uint) Marshal.SizeOf(si);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //if this member is NULL, the new process inherits the desktopDi2015NewLine            //and window station of its parent process. If this member isDi2015NewLine            //an empty string, the process does not inherit the desktop andDi2015NewLine            //window station of its parent process; instead, the systemDi2015NewLine            //determines if a new desktop and window station need to be created.Di2015NewLine            //If the impersonated user already has a desktop, the system uses theDi2015NewLine            //existing desktop.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            si.lpDesktop = @"WinSta0\\Default"; //Modify as neededDi2015NewLine            si.dwFlags = STARTF_USESHOWWINDOW | STARTF_FORCEONFEEDBACK;Di2015NewLine            si.wShowWindow = SW_SHOW;Di2015NewLine            //Set other si properties as required.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result = CreateProcessAsUser(Di2015NewLine                token,Di2015NewLine                null,Di2015NewLine                cmdLine,Di2015NewLine                ref saProcess,Di2015NewLine                ref saThread,Di2015NewLine                false,Di2015NewLine                CREATE_UNICODE_ENVIRONMENT,Di2015NewLine                envBlock,Di2015NewLine                null,Di2015NewLine                ref si,Di2015NewLine                out pi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (result == false)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int error = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine                string message = String.Format("CreateProcessAsUser Error: {0}", error);Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine(message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IntPtr GetPrimaryToken(int processId)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IntPtr token = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            IntPtr primaryToken = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            bool retVal = false;Di2015NewLine            Process p = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                p = Process.GetProcessById(processId);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            catch (ArgumentException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string details = String.Format("ProcessID {0} Not Available", processId);Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine(details);Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Gets impersonation tokenDi2015NewLine            retVal = OpenProcessToken(p.Handle, TOKEN_DUPLICATE, ref token);Di2015NewLine            if (retVal)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var sa = new SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES();Di2015NewLine                sa.nLength = (uint) Marshal.SizeOf(sa);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Convert the impersonation token into Primary tokenDi2015NewLine                retVal = DuplicateTokenEx(Di2015NewLine                    token,Di2015NewLine                    TOKEN_ASSIGN_PRIMARY | TOKEN_DUPLICATE | TOKEN_QUERY,Di2015NewLine                    ref sa,Di2015NewLine                    (int) SECURITY_IMPERSONATION_LEVEL.SecurityIdentification,Di2015NewLine                    (int) TOKEN_TYPE.TokenPrimary,Di2015NewLine                    ref primaryToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Close the Token that was previously opened.Di2015NewLine                CloseHandle(token);Di2015NewLine                if (retVal == false)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string message = String.Format("DuplicateTokenEx Error: {0}", Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine                    Debug.WriteLine(message);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string message = String.Format("OpenProcessToken Error: {0}", Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine(message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //We'll Close this token after it is used.Di2015NewLine            return primaryToken;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IntPtr GetEnvironmentBlock(IntPtr token)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IntPtr envBlock = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            bool retVal = CreateEnvironmentBlock(ref envBlock, token, false);Di2015NewLine            if (retVal == false)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Environment Block, things like common paths to My Documents etc.Di2015NewLine                //Will not be created if "false"Di2015NewLine                //It should not adversley affect CreateProcessAsUser.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string message = String.Format("CreateEnvironmentBlock Error: {0}", Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine(message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return envBlock;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool Launch(string appCmdLine /*,int processId*/)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool ret = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Either specify the processID explicitlyDi2015NewLine            //Or try to get it from a process owned by the user.Di2015NewLine            //In this case assuming there is only one explorer.exeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Process[] ps = Process.GetProcessesByName("explorer");Di2015NewLine            int processId = -1; //=processIdDi2015NewLine            if (ps.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                processId = ps[0].Id;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (processId > 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IntPtr token = GetPrimaryToken(processId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (token != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    IntPtr envBlock = GetEnvironmentBlock(token);Di2015NewLine                    ret = LaunchProcessAsUser(appCmdLine, token, envBlock);Di2015NewLine                    if (envBlock != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                        DestroyEnvironmentBlock(envBlock);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    CloseHandle(token);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return ret;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6499921Di2015UniqueSeparator  private static IEnumerable<Dictionary<string, string>> Sort(IEnumerable<Dictionary<string,string>> data, string orderByString)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     var orderBy =Di2015NewLine        orderByString.Split(',').Select(Di2015NewLine           s => s.Split(new[] {' '}, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries))Di2015NewLine           .Select (a => new {Field=a[0],Descending = "desc".Equals (a[1], StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase)})Di2015NewLine           .ToList ();Di2015NewLine     if (orderBy.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine        return data;Di2015NewLine     // First one is OrderBy or OrderByDescending.Di2015NewLine     IOrderedEnumerable<Dictionary<string, string>> ordered =Di2015NewLine        orderBy[0].Descending ? data.OrderByDescending (d => d[orderBy[0].Field]) : data.OrderBy (d => d[orderBy[0].Field]);Di2015NewLine     for (int i = 1; i < orderBy.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        // Rest are ThenBy or ThenByDescending.Di2015NewLine        var orderClause = orderBy[i];Di2015NewLine        ordered =Di2015NewLine           orderBy[i].Descending ? ordered.ThenByDescending(d => d[orderClause.Field]) : ordered.ThenBy(d => d[orderClause.Field]);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     return ordered;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

6500454Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DateTime ConvertPayPalDateTime(string payPalDateTime)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Get the offset.Di2015NewLine  // If C# supports switching on strings, it's probably more sensible to do that.Di2015NewLine  int offset;Di2015NewLine  if (payPalDateTime.EndsWith(" PDT"))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     offset = 7;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  else if (payPalDateTime.EndsWith(" PST"))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     offset = 8;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    throw some exception;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // We've "parsed" the time zone, so remove it from the string.Di2015NewLine  payPalDatetime = payPalDateTime.Substring(0,payPalDateTime.Length-4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Same formats as above, but with PST/PDT removed.Di2015NewLine  string[] dateFormats = { "HH:mm:ss MMM dd, yyyy", "HH:mm:ss MMM. dd, yyyy" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Parse the date. Throw an exception if it fails.Di2015NewLine  DateTime ret = DateTime.ParseExact(payPalDateTime, dateFormats, new CultureInfo("en-US"), DateTimeStyles.None, out outputDateTime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Add the offset, and make it a universal time.Di2015NewLine  return ret.AddHours(offset).SpecifyKind(DateTimeKind.Universal);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6501232Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class TraversalHelper{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void TraverseAndExecute<T>(this T composite, Func<T,IEnumerable<T>> selectChildren, Action<T> action)Di2015NewLine        where T: classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         action.Invoke(composite);Di2015NewLine         composite.TraverseAndExecute(selectChildren, action, new List<T>{ composite });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void TraverseAndExecute<T>(this T composite, Func<T,IEnumerable<T>> selectChildren, Action<T> action, IList<T> invokedComponents)Di2015NewLine        where T: classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        invokedComponents = invokedComponents ?? new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        var components = selectChildren(composite) ?? new T[]{};Di2015NewLine        foreach(var component in components){Di2015NewLine            // To avoid an infinite loop in the case of circular references, ensure Di2015NewLine            // that you don't loop over an object that has already been traversedDi2015NewLine            if(!invokedComponents.Contains(component)){Di2015NewLine                action.Invoke(component);Di2015NewLine                invokedComponents.Add(component);Di2015NewLine                component.TraverseAndExecute<T>(selectChildren, action, invokedComponents);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else{Di2015NewLine                // the code to execute in the event of a circular referenceDi2015NewLine                // would go hereDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6508184Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Visit<TItem>(this IEnumerable<TItem> theList,Di2015NewLine                         Action<TItem, TItem> visitor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TItem prev = default(TItem);Di2015NewLine    using (var iterator = theList.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        prev = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TItem current = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLine            visitor(prev, current);Di2015NewLine            prev = current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    visitor(prev, default(TItem)); // Are you sure you want this?Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6508892Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool IsSessionTimeoutDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime? sessionStart = Session[SessionKeys.SessionStart] as DateTime?;Di2015NewLine        bool isTimeout = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!sessionStart.HasValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If sessionStart doesn't have a value, the session has been cleared, Di2015NewLine            // so assume a timeout has occurred.            Di2015NewLine            isTimeout = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Otherwise, check the elapsed time.Di2015NewLine            TimeSpan elapsed = DateTime.Now - sessionStart.Value;Di2015NewLine            isTimeout = elapsed.TotalMinutes > Session.Timeout;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Session[SessionKeys.SessionStart] = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        return isTimeout;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6510156Di2015UniqueSeparatorMakeTransparent
6510156Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>  Di2015NewLine/// Returns a transparent background GIF image from the specified Bitmap.  Di2015NewLine/// </summary>  Di2015NewLine/// <param name="bitmap">The Bitmap to make transparent.</param>  Di2015NewLine/// <param name="color">The Color to make transparent.</param>  Di2015NewLine/// <returns>New Bitmap containing a transparent background gif.</returns>  Di2015NewLinepublic static Bitmap MakeTransparentGif(Bitmap bitmap, Color color)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte R = color.R;Di2015NewLine    byte G = color.G;Di2015NewLine    byte B = color.B;Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream fin = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    bitmap.Save(fin, System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Gif);Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream fout = new MemoryStream((int)fin.Length);Di2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte[] buf = new byte[256];Di2015NewLine    byte transparentIdx = 0;Di2015NewLine    fin.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine    //header  Di2015NewLine    count = fin.Read(buf, 0, 13);Di2015NewLine    if ((buf[0] != 71) || (buf[1] != 73) || (buf[2] != 70)) return null; //GIF  Di2015NewLine    fout.Write(buf, 0, 13);Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    if ((buf[10] & 0x80) > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        i = 1 << ((buf[10] & 7) + 1) == 256 ? 256 : 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    for (; i != 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fin.Read(buf, 0, 3);Di2015NewLine        if ((buf[0] == R) && (buf[1] == G) && (buf[2] == B))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            transparentIdx = (byte)(256 - i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        fout.Write(buf, 0, 3);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    bool gcePresent = false;Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fin.Read(buf, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine        fout.Write(buf, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine        if (buf[0] != 0x21) break;Di2015NewLine        fin.Read(buf, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine        fout.Write(buf, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine        gcePresent = (buf[0] == 0xf9);Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fin.Read(buf, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine            fout.Write(buf, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine            if (buf[0] == 0) break;Di2015NewLine            count = buf[0];Di2015NewLine            if (fin.Read(buf, 0, count) != count) return null;Di2015NewLine            if (gcePresent)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (count == 4)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    buf[0] |= 0x01;Di2015NewLine                    buf[3] = transparentIdx;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            fout.Write(buf, 0, count);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    while (count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        count = fin.Read(buf, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine        fout.Write(buf, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    fin.Close();Di2015NewLine    fout.Flush();Di2015NewLine    return new Bitmap(fout);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6512685Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ArrayComparer : IEqualityComparer<string[]>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(string[] x, string[] y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x.Length != y.Length)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var left = x.OrderBy(s => s).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        var right = y.OrderBy(s => s).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int index = 0; index < x.Length; index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (left[index] == right[index])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(string[] obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int hash = 23;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var element in obj.OrderBy(s => s))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hash = hash * 37 + element.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6522741Di2015UniqueSeparator    //assign this to the SplitContainer's MouseDown eventDi2015NewLine    private void splitCont_MouseDown(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This disables the normal move behaviorDi2015NewLine        ((SplitContainer)sender).IsSplitterFixed = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //assign this to the SplitContainer's MouseUp eventDi2015NewLine    private void splitCont_MouseUp(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This allows the splitter to be moved normally againDi2015NewLine        ((SplitContainer)sender).IsSplitterFixed = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //assign this to the SplitContainer's MouseMove eventDi2015NewLine    private void splitCont_MouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Check to make sure the splitter won't be updated by theDi2015NewLine        // normal move behavior alsoDi2015NewLine        if (((SplitContainer)sender).IsSplitterFixed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Make sure that the button used to move the splitterDi2015NewLine            // is the left mouse buttonDi2015NewLine            if (e.Button.Equals(MouseButtons.Left))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Checks to see if the splitter is aligned VerticallyDi2015NewLine                if (((SplitContainer)sender).Orientation.Equals(Orientation.Vertical))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Only move the splitter if the mouse is withinDi2015NewLine                    // the appropriate boundsDi2015NewLine                    if (e.X > 0 && e.X < ((SplitContainer)sender).Width)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Move the splitter & force a visual refreshDi2015NewLine                        ((SplitContainer)sender).SplitterDistance = e.X;Di2015NewLine                        ((SplitContainer)sender).Refresh();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // If it isn't aligned vertically then it must beDi2015NewLine                // horizontalDi2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Only move the splitter if the mouse is withinDi2015NewLine                    // the appropriate boundsDi2015NewLine                    if (e.Y > 0 && e.Y < ((SplitContainer)sender).Height)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Move the splitter & force a visual refreshDi2015NewLine                        ((SplitContainer)sender).SplitterDistance = e.Y;Di2015NewLine                        ((SplitContainer)sender).Refresh();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // If a button other than left is pressed or no buttonDi2015NewLine            // at allDi2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // This allows the splitter to be moved normally againDi2015NewLine                ((SplitContainer)sender).IsSplitterFixed = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6522822Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar a = new byte[2,  2, 2] { { { 1, 2 }, { 3, 4 } }, { { 5, 6 }, { 7, 8 } } };Di2015NewLinevar b = new byte[2 * 2, 2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//sizeof(byte) is obviously 1 here, but I put it there for documentationDi2015NewLineBuffer.BlockCopy(a, 0, b, 0, a.Length * sizeof(byte));Di2015NewLine
6522822Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte[,] a = {Di2015NewLine    {1, 2},Di2015NewLine    {3, 4},Di2015NewLine    {5, 6},Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLinevar b = new byte[a.GetLength(1) * a.GetLength(0)]; //TransposeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineconst int R_STRIDE1 = 8; //Tune this for your CPUDi2015NewLineconst int C_STRIDE1 = 8; //Tune this for your CPUDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//You should hoist the calls to GetLength() out of the loop unlike what I do hereDi2015NewLinefor (int r1 = 0; r1 < a.GetLength(0); r1 += R_STRIDE1)Di2015NewLinefor (int c1 = 0; c1 < a.GetLength(1); c1 += C_STRIDE1)Di2015NewLine    for (int r2 = 0; r2 < R_STRIDE1; r2++)Di2015NewLine    for (int c2 = 0; c2 < C_STRIDE1; c2++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var r = r1 + r2;Di2015NewLine        var c = c1 + c2;Di2015NewLine        if (r < a.GetLength(0) && c < a.GetLength(1))Di2015NewLine            b[c * a.GetLength(0) + r] = a[r, c];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

      }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(line);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            var parts = line.Split(' ');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (parts[0].Equals("B"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    parts[0] =        {Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(line);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result[result.Count -1] += line;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine typeof(SelectionAdorner),Di2015NewLine            new PropertyMetadata(OnUseAdornerChanged));Di2015NewLine        static void AttachToScrollViewer(Selector selector)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ScrollViewer viewer = GetScrollViewer(selector);Di2015NewLine            if (viewer != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                viewer.Tag = selector;Di2015NewLine                viewer.ScrollChanged += Viewer_ScrollChanged;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private static Pen CreatePen()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Pen pen = new Pen(Brushes.Black, 2.0);Di2015NewLine            pen.Freeze();Di2015NewLine            return pen;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private static void DetachAdorner(Selector selector)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SelectionAdorner adorner;Di2015NewLine            if (_dictionary.TryGetValue(selector, out adorner))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                adorner._adornerLayer.Remove(adorner);Di2015NewLine                _dictionary.Remove(selector);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private static SelectionAdorner GetAdorner(Selector selector)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SelectionAdorner adorner;Di2015NewLine            if (!_dictionary.TryGetValue(selector, out adorner))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _dictionary.Add(selector, adorner = new SelectionAdorner(selector));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return adorner;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private static Rect GetBounds(Selector selector, UIElement containerElement)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Rect bounds = VisualTreeHelper.GetDescendantBounds(containerElement);Di2015NewLine            return new Rect(containerElement.TranslatePoint(bounds.TopLeft, selector), bounds.Size);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private static ScrollViewer GetScrollViewer(DependencyObject d)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<DependencyObject> list = new List<DependencyObject>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (DependencyObject child in Enumerable.Range(0, VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(d)).Select(index => VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(d, index)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ScrollViewer viewer = child as ScrollViewer;Di2015NewLine                if (viewer != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return viewer;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                list.Add(child);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return list.Select(GetScrollViewer).FirstOrDefault(viewer => viewer != null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private static void OnUseAdornerChanged(DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Selector selector = d as Selector;Di2015NewLine            if (selector != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (((bool)e.NewValue))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    selector.SelectionChanged += Selector_SelectionChanged;Di2015NewLine                    if (!selector.IsLoaded)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        selector.Loaded += Selector_Loaded;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        AttachToScrollViewer(selector);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    ProcessSelection(selector);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    selector.SelectionChanged -= Selector_SelectionChanged;Di2015NewLine                    if (!selector.IsLoaded)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        selector.Loaded -= Selector_Loaded;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ScrollViewer viewer = GetScrollViewer(selector);Di2015NewLine                        if (viewer != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            viewer.ScrollChanged -= Viewer_ScrollChanged;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    DetachAdorner(selector);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private static void ProcessSelection(Selector selector)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ListBox listBox = selector as ListBox;Di2015NewLine            if (listBox != null && listBox.SelectionMode != SelectionMode.Single)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (listBox.SelectedItems.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    object[] selectedItems = new object[listBox.SelectedItems.Count];Di2015NewLine                    listBox.SelectedItems.CopyTo(selectedItems, 0);Di2015NewLine                    ProcessSelection(selector, selectedItems);Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (selector.SelectedItem != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ProcessSelection(selector, new[] { selector.SelectedItem });Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            DetachAdorner(selector);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private static void ProcessSelection(Selector selector, IEnumerable<object> selectedItems)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<DependencyObject> containers = new List<DependencyObject>();Di2015NewLine            List<int> indices = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (DependencyObject container in selectedItemsDi2015NewLine                .Select(selectedItem => selector.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem(selectedItem))Di2015NewLine                .Where(container => container != null))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int containerIndex = selector.ItemContainerGenerator.IndexFromContainer(container);Di2015NewLine                int index = indices.BinarySearch(containerIndex);Di2015NewLine                containers.Insert(~index, container);Di2015NewLine                indices.Insert(~index, containerIndex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i < indices.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (indices[i] != (indices[i - 1] + 1))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Not contiguousDi2015NewLine                    DetachAdorner(selector);Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Rect bounds = GetBounds(selector, (UIElement)containers[0]);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i < containers.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bounds.Union(GetBounds(selector, (UIElement)containers[i]));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            GetAdorner(selector).Update(bounds);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        static void Selector_Loaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var selector = (Selector)sender;Di2015NewLine            AttachToScrollViewer(selector);Di2015NewLine            selector.Loaded -= Selector_Loaded;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private static void Selector_SelectionChanged(object sender, SelectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ProcessSelection((Selector)sender);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        static void Viewer_ScrollChanged(object sender, ScrollChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ProcessSelection((Selector)((FrameworkElement)sender).Tag);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public static bool GetUseAdorner(Selector control)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (bool)control.GetValue(UseAdornerProperty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public static void SetUseAdorner(Selector control, bool useAdorner)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            control.SetValue(UseAdornerProperty, useAdorner);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private readonly AdornerLayer _adornerLayer;Di2015NewLine        private Rect _bounds;Di2015NewLine        private void Update(Rect bounds)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this._bounds = bounds;Di2015NewLine            this.InvalidateVisual();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        protected override void OnRender(DrawingContext drawingContext)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            drawingContext.DrawRectangle(null, _pen, this._bounds);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private SelectionAdorner(Selector selector)Di2015NewLine            : base(selector)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((_adornerLayer = AdornerLayer.GetAdornerLayer(selector)) 6541208Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Bitmap ProportionallyResizeBitmap (Bitmap src, int maxWidth, int maxHeight)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// original dimensionsDi2015NewLineint w = src.Width;Di2015NewLineint h = src.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Longest and shortest dimensionDi2015NewLineint longestDimension = (w>h)?w: h;Di2015NewLineint shortestDimension = (w<h)?w: h;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// propotionalityDi2015NewLinefloat factor = ((float)longestDimension) / shortestDimension;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// default width is greater than heightDi2015NewLinedouble newWidth = maxWidth;Di2015NewLinedouble newHeight = maxWidth/factor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// if height greater than width recalculateDi2015NewLineif ( w < h )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    newWidth = maxHeight / factor;Di2015NewLine    newHeight = maxHeight;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create new Bitmap at new dimensionsDi2015NewLineBitmap result = new Bitmap((int)newWidth, (int)newHeight);Di2015NewLineusing ( Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage((System.Drawing.Image)result) )Di2015NewLineg.DrawImage(src, 0, 0, (int)newWidth, (int)newHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6541634Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Serializes an object to Xml as a string.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T">Datatype T.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="ToSerialize">Object of type T to be serialized.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Xml string of serialized type T object.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string SerializeToXmlString<T>(T ToSerialize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string xmlstream = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream memstream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlSerializer xmlSerializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        XmlTextWriter xmlWriter = new XmlTextWriter(memstream, Encoding.UTF8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        xmlSerializer.Serialize(xmlWriter, ToSerialize);Di2015NewLine        xmlstream = UTF8ByteArrayToString(((MemoryStream)xmlWriter.BaseStream).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return xmlstream;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Deserializes Xml string of type T.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T">Datatype T.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="XmlString">Input Xml string from which to read.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Returns rehydrated object of type T.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static T DeserializeXmlString<T>(string XmlString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T tempObject = default(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream(StringToUTF8ByteArray(XmlString)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlSerializer xs = new XmlSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        XmlTextWriter xmlTextWriter = new XmlTextWriter(memoryStream, Encoding.UTF8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tempObject = (T)xs.Deserialize(memoryStream);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tempObject;Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Convert Array to StringDi2015NewLinepublic static String UTF8ByteArrayToString(Byte[] ArrBytes)Di2015NewLine{ return new UTF8Encoding().GetString(ArrBytes); }Di2015NewLine// Convert String to ArrayDi2015NewLinepublic static Byte[] StringToUTF8ByteArray(String XmlString)Di2015NewLine{ return new UTF8Encoding().GetBytes(XmlString); }Di2015NewLine

6544082Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static readonly byte[] SALT = new byte[] { 0x26, 0xdc, 0xff, 0x00, 0xad, 0xed, 0x7a, 0xee, 0xc5, 0xfe, 0x07, 0xaf, 0x4d, 0x08, 0x22, 0x3c };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static byte[] Encrypt(byte[] plain, string password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream memoryStream;Di2015NewLine    CryptoStream cryptoStream;Di2015NewLine    Rijndael rijndael = Rijndael.Create();Di2015NewLine    Rfc2898DeriveBytes pdb = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(password, SALT);Di2015NewLine    rijndael.Key = pdb.GetBytes(32);Di2015NewLine    rijndael.IV = pdb.GetBytes(16);Di2015NewLine    memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, rijndael.CreateEncryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine    cryptoStream.Write(plain, 0, plain.Length);Di2015NewLine    cryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    return memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static byte[] Decrypt(byte[] cipher, string password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream memoryStream;Di2015NewLine    CryptoStream cryptoStream;Di2015NewLine    Rijndael rijndael = Rijndael.Create();Di2015NewLine    Rfc2898DeriveBytes pdb = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(password, SALT);Di2015NewLine    rijndael.Key = pdb.GetBytes(32);Di2015NewLine    rijndael.IV = pdb.GetBytes(16);Di2015NewLine    memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, rijndael.CreateDecryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine    cryptoStream.Write(cipher, 0, cipher.Length);Di2015NewLine    cryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    return memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6548545Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DownloadFileDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Url { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string PathToSave { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ParallelDownloadingDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private ConcurrentQueue<DownloadFile> _queueToDownlaod;Di2015NewLine        private IList<Task> _downloadingTasks;Di2015NewLine        private Timer _downloadTimer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int _parallelDownloads;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ParallelDownloading(int parallelDownloads)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _queueToDownlaod = new ConcurrentQueue<DownloadFile>();Di2015NewLine            _downloadingTasks = new List<Task>();Di2015NewLine            _downloadTimer = new Timer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _parallelDownloads = parallelDownloads;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _downloadTimer.Elapsed += new ElapsedEventHandler(DownloadTimer_Elapsed);Di2015NewLine            _downloadTimer.Interval = 1000;Di2015NewLine            _downloadTimer.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ServicePointManager.DefaultConnectionLimit = parallelDownloads;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void EnqueueFileToDownload(DownloadFile file)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _queueToDownlaod.Enqueue(file);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void DownloadTimer_Elapsed(object sender, ElapsedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StartDownload();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void StartDownload()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_downloadingTasks)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_downloadingTasks.Count < _parallelDownloads && _queueToDownlaod.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    DownloadFile fileToDownload;Di2015NewLine                    if (_queueToDownlaod.TryDequeue(out fileToDownload))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var task = new Task(() =>Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            var client = new WebClient();Di2015NewLine                            client.DownloadFile(fileToDownload.Url, fileToDownload.PathToSave);Di2015NewLine                        }, TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        task.ContinueWith(DownloadOverCallback, TaskContinuationOptions.None);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        _downloadingTasks.Add(task);Di2015NewLine                        task.Start();Di2015NewLine                    }      Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void DownloadOverCallback(Task downloadingTask)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_downloadingTasks)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _downloadingTasks.Remove(downloadingTask);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6553276Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IsNullOrDefault<T>(T argument)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // deal with normal scenariosDi2015NewLine    if (argument == null) return true;Di2015NewLine    if (object.Equals(argument, default(T))) return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // deal with non-null nullablesDi2015NewLine    Type methodType = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine    if (Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(methodType) != null) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // deal with boxed value typesDi2015NewLine    Type argumentType = argument.GetType();Di2015NewLine    if (argumentType.IsValueType && argumentType != methodType) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object obj = Activator.CreateInstance(argument.GetType());Di2015NewLine        return obj.Equals(argument);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6555263Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string asmBase ;Di2015NewLinepublic void LoaddAssembly(string assemblyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    asmBase = System.IO.Path.GetDirectoryName(assemblyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    AppDomain.CurrentDomain.AssemblyResolve += new ResolveEventHandler(CurrentDomain_AssemblyResolve);Di2015NewLine    System.Reflection.Assembly asm = System.Reflection.Assembly.Load(System.IO.File.ReadAllBytes(assemblyName));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Assembly CurrentDomain_AssemblyResolve(object sender, ResolveEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //This handler is called only when the common language runtime tries to bind to the assembly and fails.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Retrieve the list of referenced assemblies in an array of AssemblyName.Di2015NewLine    Assembly MyAssembly, objExecutingAssemblies;Di2015NewLine    string strTempAssmbPath = "";Di2015NewLine    objExecutingAssemblies = args.RequestingAssembly;Di2015NewLine    AssemblyName[] arrReferencedAssmbNames = objExecutingAssemblies.GetReferencedAssemblies();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Loop through the array of referenced assembly names.Di2015NewLine    foreach (AssemblyName strAssmbName in arrReferencedAssmbNames)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Check for the assembly names that have raised the "AssemblyResolve" event.Di2015NewLine        if (strAssmbName.FullName.Substring(0, strAssmbName.FullName.IndexOf(",")) == args.Name.Substring(0, args.Name.IndexOf(",")))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Build the path of the assembly from where it has to be loaded.                Di2015NewLine            strTempAssmbPath = asmBase + "\\\\" + args.Name.Substring(0, args.Name.IndexOf(",")) + ".dll";Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Load the assembly from the specified path.                    Di2015NewLine    MyAssembly = Assembly.LoadFrom(strTempAssmbPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Return the loaded assembly.Di2015NewLine    return MyAssembly;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6557847Di2015UniqueSeparator// @struct IEEE_DOUBLEREP | allows bit access to 8 byte floatsDi2015NewLine//[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine//public struct ieee_doublerepDi2015NewLine//{Di2015NewLine//    ulong low_mantissa;         // @field exponent of floating point numberDi2015NewLine//    uint sign:1;              // @field sign of floating point numberDi2015NewLine//};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic struct DoubleExDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public const long NANMASK = 0x7FF0000000000000;Di2015NewLine    public const long INFINITYMASK = 0x000FFFFFFFFFFFFF;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public const double NaN = 0.0f / 0.0f;Di2015NewLine    public const double NegativeInfinity = -1.0f / 0.0f;Di2015NewLine    public const double PositiveInfinity = 1.0f / 0.0f;Di2015NewLine    public static bool IsNaNBad(double x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return x != x;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public unsafe static bool IsNaN(double value)        Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long rep = *((long*)&value);Di2015NewLine        return ((rep & NANMASK) == NANMASK &&Di2015NewLine                ((rep & INFINITYMASK) != 0));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public unsafe static bool IsPositiveInfinity(double value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double negInf = DoubleEx.PositiveInfinity;Di2015NewLine        return *((long*)&value) == *((long*)&negInf);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public unsafe static bool IsNegativeInfinity(double value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double posInf = DoubleEx.PositiveInfinity;Di2015NewLine        return *((long*)&value) == *((long*)&posInf);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public unsafe static bool IsInfinite(double x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long rep = *((long*)&x);Di2015NewLine        return ((rep & NANMASK) == NANMASK &&Di2015NewLine                ((rep & INFINITYMASK) == 0));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6560136Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Node Find(Node node, string targetName, ref int ancenstorCount) {Di2015NewLine    if ( node == null )Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    if ( ancenstorCount == 0 ) // we've already found the right level to returnDi2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    if ( node.name == targetName )Di2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    foreach ( Node child in node.Children ) {Di2015NewLine        var found = Find(child, targetName);Di2015NewLine        if ( found != null ) {Di2015NewLine            if ( ancenstorCount == 0 )Di2015NewLine                return found;Di2015NewLine            --ancenstorCount;Di2015NewLine            return node; // return any non-null Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6560136Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TreeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class Node {Di2015NewLine        private List<Node> _kids = new List<Node>();Di2015NewLine        public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public List<Node> Children { get { return _kids; } }Di2015NewLine        public void Add(Node child) { _kids.Add(child); }Di2015NewLine        public override string ToString() { return Name; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Node _root;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine            new Program().Run();Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("Press any key ...");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Program() {Di2015NewLine            _root = GenerateTree();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static Node GenerateTree()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Gen0Di2015NewLine            Node root = new Node() { Name = "Great-grandpa Jimmy Joe Jim-Bob John Keith Luke Duke" };Di2015NewLine            // Add Gen1 to Gen0Di2015NewLine            root.Add(new Node() { Name = "GrandUncle Joe Duke" });Di2015NewLine            Node grandDad = new Node() { Name = "Granddad Jimmy Duke" };Di2015NewLine            root.Add(grandDad);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add Gen2 to Gen1Di2015NewLine            grandDad.Add(new Node() { Name = "Uncle Jim" });Di2015NewLine            grandDad.Add(new Node() { Name = "Uncle Bob" });Di2015NewLine            Node dad = new Node() { Name = "Dad John" };Di2015NewLine            grandDad.Add(dad);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add Gen3 to Gen2Di2015NewLine            dad.Add(new Node() { Name = "Brother Luke" });Di2015NewLine            dad.Add(new Node() { Name = "Keith" });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return root;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void Run() {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("My Great-granddad is: " + Find("Keith", 3));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("My granddad is: " + Find("Keith", 2));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("My dad is: " + Find("Keith", 1));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Brother Luke's Dad is: " + Find("Brother Luke", 1));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Uncle Bob's dad is: " + Find("Uncle Bob", 1));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Uncle Jim's granddad is: " + Find("Uncle Jim", 2));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Lunil's mom is: " + Find("Lunil", 1));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string Find(string targetName, int anticedentLevel) {Di2015NewLine            Node n = Find(_root, targetName, ref anticedentLevel);Di2015NewLine            return n!=null ? n.ToString() : "#NOT_FOUND#";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static Node Find(Node node, string targetName, ref int ancenstorCount) {Di2015NewLine            if ( node == null )Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            if ( ancenstorCount == 0 ) // we've already found the right level to returnDi2015NewLine                return node;Di2015NewLine            if ( node.Name == targetName )Di2015NewLine                return node;Di2015NewLine            foreach ( Node child in node.Children ) {Di2015NewLine                var found = Find(child, targetName, ref ancenstorCount);Di2015NewLine                if ( found != null ) {Di2015NewLine                    if ( ancenstorCount == 0 )Di2015NewLine                        return found;Di2015NewLine                    --ancenstorCount;Di2015NewLine                    return node; // return any non-null Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6560284Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Func<User, bool> CompileRule(Rule r)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var paramUser = Expression.Parameter(typeof(User));Di2015NewLine    Expression expr = BuildExpr(r, paramUser);Di2015NewLine    // build a lambda function User->bool and compile itDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<User, bool>>(expr, paramUser).Compile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6560284Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<Rule> rules = new List<Rule> {Di2015NewLine    new Rule ("Age", "GreaterThan", "20"),Di2015NewLine    new Rule ( "Name", "Equal", "John"),Di2015NewLine    new Rule ( "Tags", "Contains", "C#" )Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// compile the rules onceDi2015NewLinevar compiledRules = rules.Select(r => CompileRule(r)).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic bool MatchesAllRules(User user)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return compiledRules.All(rule => rule(user));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6560284Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression BuildExpr(Rule r, ParameterExpression param)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var left = MemberExpression.Property(param, r.MemberName);Di2015NewLine    var tProp = typeof(User).GetProperty(r.MemberName).PropertyType;Di2015NewLine    ExpressionType tBinary;Di2015NewLine    // is the operator a known .NET operator?Di2015NewLine    if (ExpressionType.TryParse(r.Operator, out tBinary)) {Di2015NewLine        var right = Expression.Constant(Convert.ChangeType(r.TargetValue, tProp));Di2015NewLine        // use a binary operation, e.g. 'Equal' -> 'u.Age == 15'Di2015NewLine        return Expression.MakeBinary(tBinary, left, right);Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        var method = tProp.GetMethod(r.Operator);Di2015NewLine        var tParam = method.GetParameters()[0].ParameterType;Di2015NewLine        var right = Expression.Constant(Convert.ChangeType(r.TargetValue, tParam));Di2015NewLine        // use a method call, e.g. 'Contains' -> 'u.Tags.Contains(some_tag)'Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Call(left, method, right);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
