6561822Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask
6561822Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void FromWebClientRequest(int[] ids);Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   IRepoType repoType = container.Resolve<IRepoType>();Di2015NewLine   ILogger logger = container.Resolve<ILogger>();Di2015NewLine   // remove LongRunning if your operations are not blocking (Ie. read file or download file  long running queries etc)Di2015NewLine   // prefer fairness is here to try to complete first the requests that came first, so client are more likely to be able to be served "first come, first served" in case of high CPU use with lot of requestsDi2015NewLine   Task.Factory.StartNew(() => DoSomeWorkInParallel(ids, repoType, logger), TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning | TaskCreationOptions.PreferFairness);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void DoSomeWorkInParallel(int[] ids, IRepoType repository, ILogger logger)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // if there are blocking operations inside this loop you ought to convert it to tasks with LongRunningDi2015NewLine    // why this? to force more threads as usually would be used to run the loop, and try to saturate cpu use, which would be doing nothing most of the timeDi2015NewLine    // beware of doing this if you work on a non clustered database, since you can saturate it and have a bottleneck there, you should try and see how it handles your workloadDi2015NewLine    Parallel.ForEach(ids, id=>{Di2015NewLine                  // Some work will be done here...Di2015NewLine                  // use repositoryDi2015NewLine             });Di2015NewLine   logger.Log("finished all work");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6561822Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask.Factory.StartNew(() => DoSomeWork(), TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning);Di2015NewLine
6561822Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar task = Task.Factory.StartNew(() => DoSomeWork());Di2015NewLinetask.Wait();Di2015NewLine

6570346Di2015UniqueSeparatorToArray
6570346Di2015UniqueSeparatorstruct Buffer<TElement>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal TElement[] items;Di2015NewLine    internal int count;Di2015NewLine    internal Buffer(IEnumerable<TElement> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TElement[] array = null;Di2015NewLine        int num = 0;Di2015NewLine        ICollection<TElement> collection = source as ICollection<TElement>;Di2015NewLine        if (collection != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            num = collection.Count;Di2015NewLine            if (num > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                array = new TElement[num];Di2015NewLine                collection.CopyTo(array, 0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (TElement current in source)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (array == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    array = new TElement[4];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (array.Length == num)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        TElement[] array2 = new TElement[checked(num * 2)];Di2015NewLine                        Array.Copy(array, 0, array2, 0, num);Di2015NewLine                        array = array2;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                array[num] = current;Di2015NewLine                num++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.items = array;Di2015NewLine        this.count = num;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public TElement[] ToArray()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.count == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new TElement[0];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (this.items.Length == this.count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.items;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        TElement[] array = new TElement[this.count];Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(this.items, 0, array, 0, this.count);Di2015NewLine        return array;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine        // The order of items in a dictionary are not guarenteed to be the same as the order they were added.Di2015NewLine        var names = d.Keys.OrderBy(l => l).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Not clear if you know the number of items that will be in the list in advance - if not, find the max size Di2015NewLine        int maxSize = d.Values.Max(a => a != null ? a.Length : 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(String.Join(", ", names));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < maxSize; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (string name in names)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string[] value = d[name];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if ((value != null) && (i < value.Length))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.Write(value[i]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (name != names.Last())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.Write(",");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6571884Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IList<DatesBag> GetDateInfo(DateTime givenDate, int numberOfWeeks)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new List<DatesBag>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < numberOfWeeks; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int firstWeekDay = Week.GetFirstDayOfWeek(givenDate).Day;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DatesBag datesBag = new DatesBagDi2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    Week = (WeeksOfAMonth) ((firstWeekDay / 7) + ((firstWeekDay % 7 == 0) ? 0 : 1)),Di2015NewLine                                    FirstDayOfWeek = Week.GetFirstDayOfWeek(givenDate),Di2015NewLine                                    LastDayOfWeek = Week.GetLastDayOfWeek(givenDate)Di2015NewLine                                    };Di2015NewLine        result.Add(datesBag);Di2015NewLine        givenDate = givenDate.AddDays(datesBag.WeekLength + 1);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DatesBagDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public WeeksOfAMonth Week { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DateTime FirstDayOfWeek { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DateTime LastDayOfWeek { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int WeekLength { get { return LastDayOfWeek.Day - FirstDayOfWeek.Day; } }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class WeekDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static DateTime GetFirstDayOfWeek(DateTime givenDate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime tmp = givenDate.Date;Di2015NewLine        while (tmp.AddDays(-1).Month == givenDate.Month && tmp.DayOfWeek > DayOfWeek.Monday)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tmp = tmp.AddDays(-1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static DateTime GetLastDayOfWeek(DateTime givenDate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime tmp = givenDate.Date;Di2015NewLine        while (tmp.AddDays(1).Month == givenDate.Month && tmp.DayOfWeek != DayOfWeek.Sunday)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tmp = tmp.AddDays(1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6572941Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Function FindCodeElement(ByVal caretPosition As TextPoint, ByVal elems As CodeElements) As CodeElementDi2015NewLine    If elems Is Nothing Then Return NothingDi2015NewLine    Return elems.Cast(Of CodeElement) _Di2015NewLine                .Where(Function(x) x.StartPoint.LessThan(caretPosition) AndAlso _Di2015NewLine                                   x.EndPoint.GreaterThan(caretPosition)) _Di2015NewLine                .Select(Function(x) If(FindCodeElement(caretPosition, GetMembers(x)), x)) _Di2015NewLine                .FirstOrDefault()Di2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine
6572941Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Sub FindAllCandidates(ByVal elem As Object, ByVal className As String)Di2015NewLine    If TypeOf elem Is CodeFunction ThenDi2015NewLine        FindAllCandidates(CType(elem, CodeFunction).Parent, className)Di2015NewLine    ElseIf TypeOf elem Is CodeClass ThenDi2015NewLine        mCandidates.Add(CType(elem, CodeClass).FullName & "." & className)Di2015NewLine        FindAllCandidates(CType(elem, CodeClass).Parent, className)Di2015NewLine    ElseIf TypeOf elem Is CodeStruct ThenDi2015NewLine        mCandidates.Add(CType(elem, CodeStruct).FullName & "." & className)Di2015NewLine        FindAllCandidates(CType(elem, CodeStruct).Parent, className)Di2015NewLine    ElseIf TypeOf elem Is CodeNamespace ThenDi2015NewLine        mCandidates.Add(CType(elem, CodeNamespace).FullName & "." & className)Di2015NewLine        For Each ns As String In CType(elem, CodeNamespace).Members.OfType(Of CodeImport) _Di2015NewLine                                                                   .Select(Function(x) x.Namespace)Di2015NewLine            mCandidates.Add(ns & "." & className)Di2015NewLine        NextDi2015NewLine        FindAllCandidates(CType(elem, CodeNamespace).Parent, className)Di2015NewLine    ElseIf TypeOf elem Is FileCodeModel ThenDi2015NewLine        For Each ns As String In CType(elem, FileCodeModel).CodeElements.OfType(Of CodeImport) _Di2015NewLine                                                                        .Select(Function(x) x.Namespace)Di2015NewLine            mCandidates.Add(ns & "." & className)Di2015NewLine        NextDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine
6572941Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Function FindClassInCodeElements(ByVal elems As CodeElements) As CodeElementDi2015NewLine    If elems Is Nothing Then Return NothingDi2015NewLine    For Each elem As CodeElement In elemsDi2015NewLine        If IsClassType(elem) ThenDi2015NewLine            If mCandidates.Contains(elem.FullName) Then Return elemDi2015NewLine        ElseIf TypeOf elem Is CodeNamespace ThenDi2015NewLine            For Each candidate As String In mCandidatesDi2015NewLine                If candidate.StartsWith(elem.FullName) ThenDi2015NewLine                    Dim found As CodeElement = FindClassInCodeElements(GetMembers(elem))Di2015NewLine                    If found IsNot Nothing Then Return foundDi2015NewLine                    Exit ForDi2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine            NextDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLine    Return NothingDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine
6572941Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Function IsClassType(ByVal elem As CodeElement) As BooleanDi2015NewLine    Return TypeOf elem Is CodeClass OrElse TypeOf elem Is CodeStruct OrElse TypeOf elem Is CodeInterfaceDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Function GetMembers(ByVal elem As CodeElement) As CodeElementsDi2015NewLine    If TypeOf elem Is CodeClass ThenDi2015NewLine        Return CType(elem, CodeClass).MembersDi2015NewLine    ElseIf TypeOf elem Is CodeNamespace ThenDi2015NewLine        Return CType(elem, CodeNamespace).MembersDi2015NewLine    ElseIf TypeOf elem Is CodeStruct ThenDi2015NewLine        Return CType(elem, CodeStruct).MembersDi2015NewLine    ElseIf TypeOf elem Is CodeInterface ThenDi2015NewLine        Return CType(elem, CodeInterface).MembersDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLine    Return NothingDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine
6572941Di2015UniqueSeparatorDim mCandidates As New HashSet(Of String)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSub ExpandFullNameOfSelection()Di2015NewLine    Dim selection As EnvDTE.TextSelection = CType(DTE.ActiveDocument.Selection(), EnvDTE.TextSelection)Di2015NewLine    ' Assume type is selectedDi2015NewLine    Dim className As String = selection.TextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' Find current contextDi2015NewLine    Dim currentFunction As CodeElement = FindCodeElement(selection.ActivePoint, DTE.ActiveDocument.ProjectItem.FileCodeModel.CodeElements)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    mCandidates.Clear()Di2015NewLine    FindAllCandidates(currentFunction, className)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim classType As CodeElement = DTE.Solution.Projects.Cast(Of Project) _Di2015NewLine                                                        .Where(Function(x) x.CodeModel IsNot Nothing) _Di2015NewLine                                                        .Select(Function(x) FindClassInCodeElements(x.CodeModel.CodeElements)) _Di2015NewLine                                                        .FirstOrDefault(Function(x) x IsNot Nothing)Di2015NewLine    If classType IsNot Nothing ThenDi2015NewLine        selection.Text = classType.FullName ' replace with full nameDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

6574362Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Parses registrant XML returned from SharePoint's Lists web service into a collection Di2015NewLine/// of <see cref="Registrant"/> objects (root element = "listitems").Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="xml">SharePoint XML</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Collection of Registrant objects, or null if no registrant data could be parsed.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static List<Registrant> ParseSharePointXmlCollection( XElement xml ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Test: Not expected XML element or has no child elementsDi2015NewLine  if ( !xml.Name.LocalName.Equals( "listitems" ) || !xml.HasElements ) {Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  List<Registrant> regList = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  XElement data = xml.Element( XName.Get( "data", "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:rowset" ) );Di2015NewLine  if ( (data != null) && (data.HasElements) ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    regList = new List<Registrant>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<XElement> regXmlNodes = data.Elements( XName.Get( "row", "#RowsetSchema" ) );Di2015NewLine    foreach (XElement regXml in regXmlNodes) {Di2015NewLine      Registrant reg = ParseSharePointXml( regXml );Di2015NewLine      if ( reg != null ) {Di2015NewLine        regList.Add( reg );Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return regList;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Parses registrant XML returned from SharePoint's Lists web service into a single Di2015NewLine/// <see cref="Registrant"/> object (root element = "row").Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="xml">SharePoint XML</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A Registrant object, or null if no registrant data could be parsed.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static Registrant ParseSharePointXml( XElement xml ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Test: Not expected XML element or has no attributesDi2015NewLine  if ( !xml.Name.LocalName.Equals( "row" ) || !xml.HasAttributes ) {Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Registrant reg = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Parse ID (if this fails, fail the whole operation)Di2015NewLine  if ( xml.Attribute( "ows_ID" ) != null ) {Di2015NewLine    reg = new Registrant();Di2015NewLine    reg.ID = xml.Attribute( "ows_ID" ).Value;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  else {Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Parse First NameDi2015NewLine  if ( xml.Attribute( "ows_Q_Registrant_x0020_First_x0020_N" ) != null ) {Di2015NewLine    reg.FirstName = xml.Attribute( "ows_Q_Registrant_x0020_First_x0020_N" ).Value;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Parse Last NameDi2015NewLine  if ( xml.Attribute( "ows_Q_Registrant_x0020_Last_x0020_Na" ) != null ) {Di2015NewLine    reg.LastName = xml.Attribute( "ows_Q_Registrant_x0020_Last_x0020_Na" ).Value;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Parse EmailDi2015NewLine  if ( xml.Attribute( "ows_Q_Registrant_x0020_Email" ) != null ) {Di2015NewLine    reg.Email = xml.Attribute( "ows_Q_Registrant_x0020_Email" ).Value;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Parse Assistant NameDi2015NewLine  if ( xml.Attribute( "ows_Q_Asst_x0020_First_x0020_Name" ) != null ) {Di2015NewLine    reg.AssistantFirstName = xml.Attribute( "ows_Q_Asst_x0020_First_x0020_Name" ).Value;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  if ( xml.Attribute( "ows_Q_Asst_x0020_Name" ) != null ) {Di2015NewLine    reg.AssistantLastName = xml.Attribute( "ows_Q_Asst_x0020_Name" ).Value;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Parse Assistant EmailDi2015NewLine  if ( xml.Attribute( "ows_Q_Asst_x0020_Email" ) != null ) {Di2015NewLine    reg.AssistantEmail = xml.Attribute( "ows_Q_Asst_x0020_Email" ).Value;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return reg;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6574626Di2015UniqueSeparatorRemoteFileExists
6574626Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static bool RemoteFileExists(this string url, int timeout)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Creating the HttpWebRequestDi2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest request = WebRequest.Create(url) as HttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // ************ ADDED HEREDi2015NewLine            // timeout the request after x millisecondsDi2015NewLine            request.Timeout = timeout;Di2015NewLine            // ************Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Setting the Request method HEAD, you can also use GET too.Di2015NewLine            request.Method = "HEAD";Di2015NewLine            //Getting the Web Response.Di2015NewLine            HttpWebResponse response = request.GetResponse() as HttpWebResponse;Di2015NewLine            //Returns TRUE if the Status code == 200Di2015NewLine            return (response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Any exception will returns false.Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6575234Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Management;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This example shows synchronous consumption of events. Di2015NewLine// The client is blocked while waiting for events. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class EventWatcherPolling Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static int Main(string[] args) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create event query to be notified within 1 second of Di2015NewLine        // a change in a serviceDi2015NewLine        WqlEventQuery query = Di2015NewLine            new WqlEventQuery("__InstanceCreationEvent", Di2015NewLine            new TimeSpan(0,0,1), Di2015NewLine            "TargetInstance isa \\"Win32_Process\\"");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Initialize an event watcher and subscribe to events Di2015NewLine        // that match this queryDi2015NewLine        ManagementEventWatcher watcher =Di2015NewLine            new ManagementEventWatcher();Di2015NewLine        watcher.Query = query;Di2015NewLine        // times out watcher.WaitForNextEvent in 5 secondsDi2015NewLine        watcher.Options.Timeout = new TimeSpan(0,0,5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Block until the next event occurs Di2015NewLine        // Note: this can be done in a loop if waiting for Di2015NewLine        //        more than one occurrenceDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine            "Open an application (notepad.exe) to trigger an event.");Di2015NewLine        ManagementBaseObject e = watcher.WaitForNextEvent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Display information from the eventDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine            "Process {0} has been created, path is: {1}", Di2015NewLine            ((ManagementBaseObject)eDi2015NewLine            ["TargetInstance"])["Name"],Di2015NewLine            ((ManagementBaseObject)eDi2015NewLine            ["TargetInstance"])["ExecutablePath"]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Cancel the subscriptionDi2015NewLine        watcher.Stop();Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6576103Di2015UniqueSeparator// Renders a vector object 'v' as an arrow and a location 'loc'Di2015NewLinevoid drawVector(Vector3D v, Vector3D loc, float scayl) {Di2015NewLine  pushMatrix();Di2015NewLine  float arrowsize = 4;Di2015NewLine  // Translate to location to render vectorDi2015NewLine  translate(loc.x,loc.y);Di2015NewLine  stroke(255);Di2015NewLine  // Call vector heading function to get direction (note that pointing up is a heading of 0) and rotateDi2015NewLine  rotate(v.heading2D());Di2015NewLine  // Calculate length of vector & scale it to be bigger or smaller if necessaryDi2015NewLine  float len = v.magnitude()*scayl;Di2015NewLine  // Draw three lines to make an arrow (draw pointing up since we've rotate to the proper direction)Di2015NewLine  line(0,0,len,0);Di2015NewLine  line(len,0,len-arrowsize,+arrowsize/2);Di2015NewLine  line(len,0,len-arrowsize,-arrowsize/2);Di2015NewLine  popMatrix();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6580033Di2015UniqueSeparator#region HttpWebRequest.AddRange(long)Di2015NewLinestatic MethodInfo httpWebRequestAddRangeHelper = typeof(WebHeaderCollection).GetMethodDi2015NewLine                                        ("AddWithoutValidate", BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Adds a byte range header to a request for a specific range from the beginning or end of the requested data.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="request">The <see cref="System.Web.HttpWebRequest"/> to add the range specifier to.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="start">The starting or ending point of the range.</param>Di2015NewLinepublic static void AddRange(this HttpWebRequest request, long start) { request.AddRange(start, -1L); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Adds a byte range header to the request for a specified range.</summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="request">The <see cref="System.Web.HttpWebRequest"/> to add the range specifier to.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="start">The position at which to start sending data.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="end">The position at which to stop sending data.</param>Di2015NewLinepublic static void AddRange(this HttpWebRequest request, long start, long end)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (request == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("request");Di2015NewLine    if (start < 0) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("start", "Starting byte cannot be less than 0.");Di2015NewLine    if (end < start) end = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string key = "Range";Di2015NewLine    string val = string.Format("bytes={0}-{1}", start, end == -1 ? "" : end.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    httpWebRequestAddRangeHelper.Invoke(request.Headers, new object[] { key, val });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Send(EmailTemplates template, string subject, List to, string replyTo,Di2015NewLine    Dictionary tagValues = null, List attachments = null, List htmlLinkedResources = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MailMessage mailMessage = new MailMessage();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set up the email header.Di2015NewLine        to.ForEach(t => mailMessage.To.Add(new MailAddress(t)));Di2015NewLine        mailMessage.ReplyToList.Add(new MailAddress(replyTo));Di2015NewLine bodiesDi2015NewLine        var htmlBody = File.ReadAllText(Path.Combine(fullTemplatePath, Path.ChangeExtension(template.ToString(), "html")));Di2015NewLine        var textBody = File.ReadAllText(Path.Combine(fullTemplatePath, Path.ChangeExtension(template.ToString(), "txt")));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Replace the tags in the emailsDi2015NewLine        if (tagValues != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var entry in tagValues)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string tag = "{{" + entry.Key + "}}";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                htmlBody = htmlBody.Replace(tag, entry.Value);Di2015NewLine                textBody = textBody.Replace(tag, entry.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create plain text alternative viewDi2015NewLine        string baseTxtTemplate = File.ReadAllText(Path.Combine(fullTemplatePath, TXT_BASE_TEMPLATE));Di2015NewLine        textBody = baseTxtTemplate.Replace(TAG_CONTENT, textBody);Di2015NewLine        AlternateView textView = AlternateView.CreateAlternateViewFromString(textBody, new System.Net.Mime.ContentType("text/plain"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create html alternative viewDi2015NewLine        string baseHtmlTemplate = File.ReadAllText(Path.Combine(fullTemplatePath, HTML_BASE_TEMPLATE));Di2015NewLine        htmlBody = baseHtmlTemplate.Replace(TAG_CONTENT, htmlBody);Di2015NewLine        AlternateView htmlView = AlternateView.CreateAlternateViewFromString(htmlBody, new System.Net.Mime.ContentType("text/html"));Di2015NewLine        // Add any html linked resourcesDi2015NewLine        if (htmlLinkedResources != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            htmlLinkedResources.ForEach(lr => htmlView.LinkedResources.Add(lr));Di2015NewLine            htmlLinkedResources.ForEach(lr => textView.LinkedResources.Add(lr));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the two views (gmail will always display plain text version if its added last)Di2015NewLine        mailMessage.AlternateViews.Add(textView);Di2015NewLine        mailMessage.AlternateViews.Add(htmlView);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add any attachmentsDi2015NewLine        if (attachments != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            attachments.ForEach(a => mailMessage.Attachments.Add(a));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Send the email.Di2015NewLine        SmtpClient smtp = new SmtpClient();Di2015NewLine        smtp.Send(mailMessage);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception(String.Format("Error sending email (to:{0}, replyto:{1})", String.Join(",", to), replyTo), ex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6584323Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetFriendlyTypeName(Type type) {Di2015NewLine    if (type.IsGenericParameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return type.Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!type.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return type.FullName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var builder = new System.Text.StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    var name = type.Name;Di2015NewLine    var index = name.IndexOf("`");Di2015NewLine    builder.AppendFormat("{0}.{1}", type.Namespace, name.Substring(0, index));Di2015NewLine    builder.Append('<');Di2015NewLine    var first = true;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var arg in type.GetGenericArguments())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!first)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(',');Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        builder.Append(GetFriendlyTypeName(arg));Di2015NewLine        first = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    builder.Append('>');Di2015NewLine    return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6592906Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class QuarterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static long GetQuarters(DateTime dt1, DateTime dt2) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        double d1Quarter = GetQuarter(dt1.Month); Di2015NewLine        double d2Quarter = GetQuarter(dt2.Month); Di2015NewLine        double d1 = d2Quarter - d1Quarter; Di2015NewLine        double d2 = (4 * (dt2.Year - dt1.Year)); Di2015NewLine        return Round(d1 + d2); Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int GetQuarter(int nMonth) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        if (nMonth <= 3) Di2015NewLine            return 1; Di2015NewLine        if (nMonth <= 6) Di2015NewLine            return 2; Di2015NewLine        if (nMonth <= 9) Di2015NewLine            return 3; Di2015NewLine        return 4; Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static long Round(double dVal) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        if (dVal >= 0) Di2015NewLine              return (long)Math.Floor(dVal); Di2015NewLine        return (long)Math.Ceiling(dVal); Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6592906Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Class QuarterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Public Shared Function GetQuarters(ByVal dt1 As DateTime, ByVal dt2 As DateTime) As LongDi2015NewLine        Dim d1Quarter As Double = GetQuarter(dt1.Month)Di2015NewLine        Dim d2Quarter As Double = GetQuarter(dt2.Month)Di2015NewLine        Dim d1 As Double = d2Quarter - d1QuarterDi2015NewLine        Dim d2 As Double = (4 * (dt2.Year - dt1.Year))Di2015NewLine        Return Round(d1 + d2)Di2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Private Shared Function GetQuarter(ByVal nMonth As Integer) As IntegerDi2015NewLine        If nMonth <= 3 ThenDi2015NewLine            Return 1Di2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine        If nMonth <= 6 ThenDi2015NewLine            Return 2Di2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine        If nMonth <= 9 ThenDi2015NewLine            Return 3Di2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine        Return 4Di2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Private Shared Function Round(ByVal dVal As Double) As LongDi2015NewLine        If dVal >= 0 ThenDi2015NewLine            Return CLng(Math.Floor(dVal))Di2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine        Return CLng(Math.Ceiling(dVal))Di2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd ClassDi2015NewLine

OnStart(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Assembly assembly = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly();Di2015NewLine            _manager.ProcessMonitor.Logger.Debug("Assembly Version: ", assembly.GetName().FullName);Di2015NewLine            assembly = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SetScheduleFromConfigurationFile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _timer = new System.Timers.Timer(1000);Di2015NewLine            _timer.AutoReset = true;Di2015NewLine            _timer.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine            _timer.Elapsed += new System.Timers.ElapsedEventHandler(_timer_ZeroingProcess);Di2015NewLine            _timer.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnStop()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _timer.Stop();Di2015NewLine            _timer.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine            _timer = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // block if the Process is active!Di2015NewLine            if (_manager.State == DataMigrationState.Processing)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // I invented my own CancellableAsyncResult (back in the day), now you can use CancellationTokenSourceDi2015NewLine                CancellableAsyncResult result = _manager.RequestCancel() as CancellableAsyncResult;Di2015NewLine                while (!result.IsCompleted) { Thread.Sleep(ServiceConstants.ThreadSleepCount); }Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result.EndInvoke();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ProcessMonitorMessage message = ProcessMonitorMessage.GetErrorOccurredInstance();Di2015NewLine                    message.EventType = ProcessMonitorEventType.ProcessAlert;Di2015NewLine                    message.Severity = ProcessMessageSeverity.ErrorStop;Di2015NewLine                    message.SubjectLine = "Error while stopping service. ";Di2015NewLine                    message.EventDescription = ex.Message;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    _manager.ProcessMonitor.ReportError(message);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Private Method(s)Di2015NewLine        private bool MigrationIsScheduledToRunNow()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DateTime now = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine            foreach (string dowString in _definition.ExcludedWeekDays)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (now.DayOfWeek.ToString().Equals(dowString))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Trace.WriteLine("Today is " + dowString, "Excluded by Schedule definition");Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (string datePart in _definition.ExcludedDates)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string dateString = datePart + "/2008"; // 2008 is a leap year so it "allows" all 366 possible dates.Di2015NewLine                DateTime excludedDate = Convert.ToDateTime(dateString);Di2015NewLine                if (excludedDate.Day.Equals(now.Day) && excludedDate.Month.Equals(now.Month))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Trace.WriteLine("Today is " + datePart, "Excluded by Schedule definition");Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (DateTime runTime in _definition.DailyRunTimes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (runTime.Hour.Equals(now.Hour) && runTime.Minute.Equals(now.Minute))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Trace.WriteLine("Confirmed Scheduled RunTime: " + runTime.TimeOfDay.ToString(), "Included by Schedule definition");Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Load Scheduling Configuration Options from the Xml Config file.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private void SetScheduleFromConfigurationFile()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string basePath = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory;Di2015NewLine            if (basePath.EndsWith("\\\\")) { basePath = basePath.Substring(0, basePath.Length - 1); }Di2015NewLine            string path = string.Format("{0}\\\\Scheduling\\\\scheduledefinition.xml", basePath);Di2015NewLine            _manager.ProcessMonitor.Logger.Debug("Configuration File Path", path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            XmlSerializer serializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(SimpleScheduleManager.ScheduleDefinition));Di2015NewLine            XmlTextReader reader = new XmlTextReader(path);Di2015NewLine            reader.WhitespaceHandling = WhitespaceHandling.None;Di2015NewLine            _definition = serializer.Deserialize(reader) as SimpleScheduleManager.ScheduleDefinition;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            reader = null;Di2015NewLine            serializer = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Timer EventsDi2015NewLine        private void _timer_ZeroingProcess(object sender, System.Timers.ElapsedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (DateTime.Now.Second.Equals(0))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _timer.Interval = 60000;Di2015NewLine                _timer.Elapsed -= new System.Timers.ElapsedEventHandler(_timer_ZeroingProcess);Di2015NewLine                _timer.Elapsed += new System.Timers.ElapsedEventHandler(_timer_Elapsed);Di2015NewLine                _timer_Elapsed(sender, e);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void _timer_Elapsed(object sender, System.Timers.ElapsedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _manager.ProcessMonitor.Logger.Info("Timer Elapsed", DateTime.Now.ToString());Di2015NewLine            if (MigrationIsScheduledToRunNow())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                switch (_manager.State)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case DataMigrationState.Idle:Di2015NewLine                        _manager.ProcessMonitor.Logger.Info("DataMigration Manager is idle. Begin Processing.");Di2015NewLine                        _manager.BeginMigration();Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case DataMigrationState.Failed:Di2015NewLine                        _manager.ProcessMonitor.Logger.Warn("Data Migration is in failed state, Email <NotificationRecipients> alerting them.");Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        _manager.ProcessMonitor.Logger.Warn("DataMigration Manager is still processing.  Skipping this iteration.");Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6597160Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Func<TArg0, TArg1, TResult> Compile<TArg0, TArg1, TResult>(Expression<Func<TArg0, TArg1, TResult>> query) where TArg0 : DataContextDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (query == null)Di2015NewLine    System.Data.Linq.Error.ArgumentNull("query");Di2015NewLine  if (CompiledQuery.UseExpressionCompile((LambdaExpression) query))Di2015NewLine    return query.Compile();Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine    return new Func<TArg0, TArg1, TResult>(new CompiledQuery((LambdaExpression) query).Invoke<TArg0, TArg1, TResult>);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6597160Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool UseExpressionCompile(LambdaExpression query)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return typeof (ITable).IsAssignableFrom(query.Body.Type);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6597160Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate TResult Invoke<TArg0, TArg1, TResult>(TArg0 arg0, TArg1 arg1) where TArg0 : DataContextDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return (TResult) this.ExecuteQuery((DataContext) arg0, new object[2]Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    (object) arg0,Di2015NewLine    (object) arg1Di2015NewLine  });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6597160Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate object ExecuteQuery(DataContext context, object[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (context == null)Di2015NewLine    throw System.Data.Linq.Error.ArgumentNull("context");Di2015NewLine  if (this.compiled == null)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    lock (this)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (this.compiled == null)Di2015NewLine        this.compiled = context.Provider.Compile((Expression) this.query);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return this.compiled.Execute(context.Provider, args).ReturnValue;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6597160Di2015UniqueSeparator  public IExecuteResult Execute(IProvider provider, object[] arguments)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (provider == null)Di2015NewLine      throw System.Data.Linq.SqlClient.Error.ArgumentNull("provider");Di2015NewLine    SqlProvider sqlProvider = provider as SqlProvider;Di2015NewLine    if (sqlProvider == null)Di2015NewLine      throw System.Data.Linq.SqlClient.Error.ArgumentTypeMismatch((object) "provider");Di2015NewLine    if (!SqlProvider.CompiledQuery.AreEquivalentShapes(this.originalShape, sqlProvider.services.Context.LoadOptions))Di2015NewLine      throw System.Data.Linq.SqlClient.Error.CompiledQueryAgainstMultipleShapesNotSupported();Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine      return sqlProvider.ExecuteAll(this.query, this.queryInfos, this.factory, arguments, this.subQueries);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine
6597160Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IExecuteResult Execute(Expression query, SqlProvider.QueryInfo queryInfo, IObjectReaderFactory factory, object[] parentArgs, object[] userArgs, ICompiledSubQuery[] subQueries, object lastResult)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  this.InitializeProviderMode();Di2015NewLine  DbConnection dbConnection = this.conManager.UseConnection((IConnectionUser) this);Di2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    DbCommand command = dbConnection.CreateCommand();Di2015NewLine    command.CommandText = queryInfo.CommandText;Di2015NewLine    command.Transaction = this.conManager.Transaction;Di2015NewLine    command.CommandTimeout = this.commandTimeout;Di2015NewLine    this.AssignParameters(command, queryInfo.Parameters, userArgs, lastResult);Di2015NewLine    this.LogCommand(this.log, command);Di2015NewLine    ++this.queryCount;Di2015NewLine    switch (queryInfo.ResultShape)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      case SqlProvider.ResultShape.Singleton:Di2015NewLine        DbDataReader reader1 = command.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLine...Di2015NewLine      case SqlProvider.ResultShape.Sequence:Di2015NewLine        DbDataReader reader2 = command.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLine...Di2015NewLine      default:Di2015NewLine        return (IExecuteResult) new SqlProvider.ExecuteResult(command, queryInfo.Parameters, (IObjectReaderSession) null, (object) command.ExecuteNonQuery(), true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  finallyDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.conManager.ReleaseConnection((IConnectionUser) this);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6605626Di2015UniqueSeparator using System;Di2015NewLine using System.Web;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine namespace TT.Web.HttpModulesDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine      /// <summary>Di2015NewLine      /// HttpModule to prevent caching Di2015NewLine      /// </summary>Di2015NewLine      public class NoCacheModule : IHttpModuleDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         public NoCacheModule()Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         #region IHttpModule MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         public void Init(HttpApplication context)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             context.EndRequest += (new EventHandler(this.Application_EndRequest));Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         private void Application_EndRequest(Object source, EventArgs e) Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             HttpApplication application = (HttpApplication)source;Di2015NewLine             HttpContext context = application.Context;Di2015NewLine             context.Response.Cache.SetLastModified(DateTime.Now);Di2015NewLine             context.Response.Cache.SetExpires(DateTime.Now.AddMinutes(GetExpiryTime()));Di2015NewLine             context.Response.Cache.SetCacheability(HttpCacheability.Public);Di2015NewLine             context.Response.Cache.AppendCacheExtension("post-check=7200");Di2015NewLine         //The pre-check is in seconds and the value configured in web.config is in minutes. So need to multiply it with 60Di2015NewLine             context.Response.Cache.AppendCacheExtension("pre-check=" + (GetExpiryTime() * 60).ToString());Di2015NewLine             context.Response.CacheControl = "public";Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         #endregionDi2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

6606145Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyWebHttpBehavior : WebHttpBehaviorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override IDispatchMessageFormatter GetRequestDispatchFormatter(OperationDescription operationDescription, ServiceEndpoint endpoint)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool isRequestWrapped = this.IsRequestWrapped(operationDescription.Behaviors.Find<WebInvokeAttribute>());Di2015NewLine        IDispatchMessageFormatter originalFormatter = base.GetRequestDispatchFormatter(operationDescription, endpoint);Di2015NewLine        if (isRequestWrapped)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new MyFormUrlEncodedAwareFormatter(Di2015NewLine                operationDescription,Di2015NewLine                originalFormatter,Di2015NewLine                this.GetQueryStringConverter(operationDescription));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return originalFormatter;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool IsRequestWrapped(WebInvokeAttribute wia)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        WebMessageBodyStyle bodyStyle;Di2015NewLine        if (wia.IsBodyStyleSetExplicitly)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bodyStyle = wia.BodyStyle;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bodyStyle = this.DefaultBodyStyle;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return bodyStyle == WebMessageBodyStyle.Wrapped || bodyStyle == WebMessageBodyStyle.WrappedRequest;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class MyFormUrlEncodedAwareFormatter : IDispatchMessageFormatterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const string FormUrlEncodedContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine        OperationDescription operation;Di2015NewLine        IDispatchMessageFormatter originalFormatter;Di2015NewLine        QueryStringConverter queryStringConverter;Di2015NewLine        public MyFormUrlEncodedAwareFormatter(OperationDescription operation, IDispatchMessageFormatter originalFormatter, QueryStringConverter queryStringConverter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.operation = operation;Di2015NewLine            this.originalFormatter = originalFormatter;Di2015NewLine            this.queryStringConverter = queryStringConverter;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void DeserializeRequest(Message message, object[] parameters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (IsFormUrlEncodedMessage(message))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                XmlDictionaryReader bodyReader = message.GetReaderAtBodyContents();Di2015NewLine                bodyReader.ReadStartElement("Binary");Di2015NewLine                byte[] bodyBytes = bodyReader.ReadContentAsBase64();Di2015NewLine                string body = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(bodyBytes);Di2015NewLine                NameValueCollection pairs = HttpUtility.ParseQueryString(body);Di2015NewLine                Dictionary<string, string> values = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine                foreach (var key in pairs.AllKeys)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    values.Add(key, pairs[key]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var part in this.operation.Messages[0].Body.Parts)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (values.ContainsKey(part.Name))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        string value = values[part.Name];Di2015NewLine                        parameters[part.Index] = this.queryStringConverter.ConvertStringToValue(value, part.Type);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        parameters[part.Index] = GetDefaultValue(part.Type);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.originalFormatter.DeserializeRequest(message, parameters);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Message SerializeReply(MessageVersion messageVersion, object[] parameters, object result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException("This is a request-only formatter");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static bool IsFormUrlEncodedMessage(Message message)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object prop;Di2015NewLine            if (message.Properties.TryGetValue(WebBodyFormatMessageProperty.Name, out prop))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (((WebBodyFormatMessageProperty)prop).Format == WebContentFormat.Raw)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (message.Properties.TryGetValue(HttpRequestMessageProperty.Name, out prop))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (((HttpRequestMessageProperty)prop).Headers[HttpRequestHeader.ContentType].StartsWith(FormUrlEncodedContentType))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            return true;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static object GetDefaultValue(Type type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (type.IsValueType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine[ServiceContract]Di2015NewLinepublic class ServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [WebInvoke(BodyStyle = WebMessageBodyStyle.WrappedRequest)]Di2015NewLine    public string Concat(string text1, string text2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine contentType, string body)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest req = (HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(uri);Di2015NewLine        req.Method = method;Di2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(contentType))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            req.ContentType = contentType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (body != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] bodyBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(body);Di2015NewLine            req.GetRequestStream().Write(bodyBytes, 0, bodyBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine            req.GetRequestStream().Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse resp;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            resp = (HttpWebResponse)req.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (WebException e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            resp = (HttpWebResponse)e.Response;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("HTTP/{0} {1} {2}", resp.ProtocolVersion, (int)resp.StatusCode, resp.StatusDescription);Di2015NewLine        foreach (string headerName in 6610649Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Object CopyObject(Object from , Object to)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type fromType = from.GetType();Di2015NewLine        Type toType = to.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] fromProps = fromType.GetProperties();Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] toProps = toType.GetProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < fromProps.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo fromProp = fromProps[i];Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo toProp = toType.GetProperty(fromProp.Name);Di2015NewLine            if (toProp != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (toProp.PropertyType.Module.ScopeName != "CommonLanguageRuntimeLibrary")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!toProp.PropertyType.IsArray)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ConstructorInfo ci = toProp.PropertyType.GetConstructor(new Type[0]);Di2015NewLine                        if (ci != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            toProp.SetValue(to, ci.Invoke(null), null);Di2015NewLine                            toProp.SetValue(to, gestionRefelexion.CopyObject(fromProp.GetValue(from, null), toProp.GetValue(to, null)), null);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Type typeToArray = toProp.PropertyType.GetElementType();Di2015NewLine                        Array fromArray = fromProp.GetValue(from, null) as Array;Di2015NewLine                        toProp.SetValue(to, copyArray(fromArray, typeToArray), null);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    toProp.SetValue(to, fromProp.GetValue(from, null), null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return to;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Array copyArray(Array from, Type toType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Array toArray =null;Di2015NewLine    if (from != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        toArray= Array.CreateInstance(toType, from.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < from.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ConstructorInfo ci = toType.GetConstructor(new Type[0]);Di2015NewLine            if (ci != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                toArray.SetValue(ci.Invoke(null), i);Di2015NewLine toArray;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6616972Di2015UniqueSeparatorSortSelectedIndices
6616972Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<T> SortSelectedIndices<T>(Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> values, Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<int> selectedIndices, Di2015NewLine    Func<IEnumerable<T>, IEnumerable<T>> sort)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var selectedValues = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < selectedIndices.Count(); i++)Di2015NewLine        selectedValues.Add(values.ElementAt(selectedIndices.ElementAt(i)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sortedList = sort(selectedValues);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var finalList = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var startPositionFound = false;Di2015NewLine    for(var i = 0; i < values.Count(); i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (selectedIndices.Contains(i))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (startPositionFound) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            startPositionFound = true;Di2015NewLine            finalList.AddRange(sortedList);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            finalList.Add(values.ElementAt(i));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return finalList;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6620668Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string[] GetPeopleAutoComplete(Di2015NewLine    string filter, int maxResults, string searchType, string searchOption)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IQueryable<Person> query = _context.People;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var property = typeof(Person).GetProperty(searchType);Di2015NewLine    var method = typeof(string).GetMethod(searchOption, new[] { typeof(string) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    query = query.Where(WhereExpression(property, method, filter));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var resultQuery = query.Select(SelectExpression(property));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (searchType == "Firstname" || searchType == "Lastname")Di2015NewLine        resultQuery = resultQuery.Distinct();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return resultQuery.Take(maxResults).ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineExpression<Func<Person, bool>> WhereExpression(Di2015NewLine    PropertyInfo property, MethodInfo method, string filter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(Person), "o");Di2015NewLine    var propExpr = Expression.Property(param, property);Di2015NewLine    var methodExpr = Expression.Call(propExpr, method, Expression.Constant(filter));Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<Person, bool>>(methodExpr, param);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineExpression<Func<Person, string>> SelectExpression(PropertyInfo property)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(Person), "o");Di2015NewLine    var propExpr = Expression.Property(param, property);Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<Person, string>>(propExpr, param);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6622004Di2015UniqueSeparatorDBSCAN(D, eps, MinPts)Di2015NewLine   C = 0Di2015NewLine   for each unvisited point P in dataset DDi2015NewLine      mark P as visitedDi2015NewLine      N = getNeighbors (P, eps)Di2015NewLine      if sizeof(N) < MinPtsDi2015NewLine         mark P as NOISEDi2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine         C = next clusterDi2015NewLine         expandCluster(P, N, C, eps, MinPts)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineexpandCluster(P, N, C, eps, MinPts)Di2015NewLine   add P to cluster CDi2015NewLine   for each point P' in N Di2015NewLine      if P' is not visitedDi2015NewLine         mark P' as visitedDi2015NewLine         N' = getNeighbors(P', eps)Di2015NewLine         if sizeof(N') >= MinPtsDi2015NewLine            N = N joined with N'Di2015NewLine      if P' is not yet member of any clusterDi2015NewLine         add P' to cluster CDi2015NewLine

6627002Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ControllersInstaller : IWindsorInstallerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region IWindsorInstaller MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Install(IWindsorContainer container, IConfigurationStore store)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        container.Register(Component.For<WpRegistration.Web.Filters.AgencyAuthorize>().LifeStyle.Transient);Di2015NewLine        container.Register(Component.For<IActionInvoker>().ImplementedBy<WindsorExtensions.Mvc.WindsorActionInvoker>().LifeStyle.Transient);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        container.Register(AllTypes.FromThisAssembly()Di2015NewLine                            .BasedOn<IController>()Di2015NewLine                            .If(Component.IsInSameNamespaceAs<HomeController>())Di2015NewLine                            .If(t => t.Name.EndsWith("Controller"))Di2015NewLine                            .Configure((c => c.LifeStyle.Transient)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6627002Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.Mvc;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.Routing;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing Castle.MicroKernel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class WindsorControllerFactory : DefaultControllerFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IKernel kernel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public WindsorControllerFactory(IKernel kernel)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.kernel = kernel;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void ReleaseController(IController controller)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        kernel.ReleaseComponent(controller);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override IController GetControllerInstance(RequestContext requestContext, Type controllerType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (controllerType == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new HttpException(404, string.Format("The controller for path '{0}' could not be found.", requestContext.HttpContext.Request.Path));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IController iController = (IController)kernel.Resolve(controllerType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // new code    Di2015NewLine    if (iController is Controller)    Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ((Controller)iController).ActionInvoker = kernel.Resolve<IActionInvoker>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return iController;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6627002Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace WindsorExtensions.MvcDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class WindsorActionInvoker : ControllerActionInvokerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        readonly IKernel kernel;Di2015NewLine        public WindsorActionInvoker(IKernel kernel) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            this.kernel = kernel; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        protected override ActionExecutedContext InvokeActionMethodWithFilters(Di2015NewLine            ControllerContext controllerContextDi2015NewLine            , IList<IActionFilter> filtersDi2015NewLine            , ActionDescriptor actionDescriptorDi2015NewLine            , IDictionary<string, object> parameters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (IActionFilter actionFilter in filters)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                kernel.InjectProperties(actionFilter);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return base.InvokeActionMethodWithFilters(controllerContext, filters, actionDescriptor, parameters);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static class WindsorExtension Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        public static void InjectProperties(this IKernel kernel, object target) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            var type = target.GetType(); Di2015NewLine            foreach (var property in type.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance)) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                if (property.CanWrite && kernel.HasComponent(property.PropertyType)) Di2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLine                    var value = kernel.Resolve(property.PropertyType); Di2015NewLine                    try { property.SetValue(target, value, null); } Di2015NewLine                    catch (Exception ex) Di2015NewLine                    { Di2015NewLine                        var message = string.Format("Error setting property {0} on type {1}, See inner exception for more information.", property.Name, type.FullName);Di2015NewLine                        throw new ComponentActivatorException(message, ex); 2); // trimming the begin and end '{' / '}'Di2015NewLine                string[] pairs = parameter.Split(',');Di2015NewLine                Dictionary<int, int> result = new Dictionary<int, int>();Di2015NewLine                foreach (string pair in pairs)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string[] parts = pair.Split(':');Di2015NewLine                    string key = parts[0].Trim();Di2015NewLine                    string value = parts[1].Trim();Di2015NewLine                    if (key.StartsWith("\\"")) key = key.Substring(1);Di2015NewLine                    if (key.EndsWith("\\"")) key = key.Substring(0, key.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(int.Parse(key), int.Parse(value));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return base.ConvertStringToValue(parameter, parameterType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    class MyWebHttpBehavior : WebHttpBehaviorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        protected override QueryStringConverter GetQueryStringConverter(OperationDescription operationDescription)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new MyQueryStringConverter();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void Test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string baseAddress = "http://" + Environment.MachineName + ":8000/Service";Di2015NewLine        ServiceHost host = new ServiceHost(typeof(Service), new Uri(baseAddress));Di2015NewLine        host.AddServiceEndpoint(typeof(Service), new WebHttpBinding(), "").Behaviors.Add(new MyWebHttpBehavior());Di2015NewLine        host.Open();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Host opened");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WebClient c = new WebClient();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(c.DownloadString(baseAddress + "/CollabSortFolder?FolderId=12&Items={\\"1\\":3,\\"4\\":5,\\"6\\":7}"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Write("Press ENTER to close the host");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        host.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6632239Di2015UniqueSeparatorExtractor<MyObject>.DelegateAccessor(t => t.MySubTable[2])Di2015NewLine
6632239Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DelegateAccessor<TObject, TValue> GetAccessorsDelegates<TValue>(Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<TObject, TValue>> expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Func<TObject, TValue> getter = expression.Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Action<TObject, TValue> setter = null;Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression pValue = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TValue), "value");Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression pObj = expression.Parameters[0];Di2015NewLine    if (expression.Body is MemberExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression setterBlock = Expression.Assign(expression.Body, pValue);Di2015NewLine        Expression<Action<TObject, TValue>> setterExpression =Di2015NewLine            Expression.Lambda<Action<TObject, TValue>>(setterBlock, pObj, pValue);Di2015NewLine        setter = setterExpression.Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var getterCall = expression.Body as MethodCallExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (getterCall != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var method = getterCall.Method;Di2015NewLine            if (method.IsSpecialName && method.Name.StartsWith("get_"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var parameters = method.GetParameters()Di2015NewLine                                       .Select(p => p.ParameterType)Di2015NewLine                                       .Concat(new[] { method.ReturnType })Di2015NewLine                                       .ToArray();Di2015NewLine                var setterName = "set_" + method.Name.Substring(4);Di2015NewLine                var setterMethod =Di2015NewLine                    method.DeclaringType.GetMethod(setterName, parameters);Di2015NewLine                var setterCall = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                    getterCall.Object, setterMethod,Di2015NewLine                    getterCall.Arguments.Concat(new[] { pValue }));Di2015NewLine                var setterExpression =Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Lambda<Action<TObject, TValue>>(Di2015NewLine                        setterCall, pObj, pValue);Di2015NewLine                setter = setterExpression.Compile();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new DelegateAccessor<TObject, TValue>(getter, setter);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

opposed to HTML or raw text -->Di2015NewLine  <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes" xsi:type="xsl:output" />Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  <!-- this matches the root element and then creates a root following step out is what hung me up; the -->Di2015NewLine  <!-- issue here is that i'm taking the text out of the string/integer/date -->Di2015NewLine  <!-- nodes and putting them into elements named after the 'key' nodes -->Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  <!-- because of this, you actually have to have the template match the -->Di2015NewLine  <!-- nodes you will be consuming and then just using the conditional -->Di2015NewLine  <!-- to only process the 'key' nodes.  also, there were a couple of -->Di2015NewLine  <!-- stray characters in the source XML; i think it was an encoding -->Di2015NewLine  <!-- issue, so i just stripped them out with the "translate" call when -->Di2015NewLine  <!-- creating the keyName variable. since those were the only two -->Di2015NewLine  <!-- and because they looked to be strays, i did not worry about it -->Di2015NewLine  <!-- further.  the only reason it is an issue is because i was -->Di2015NewLine  <!-- creating elements out of the contents of the keys, and key names -->Di2015NewLine  <!-- are restricted in what characters they can use. -->Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  <xsl:template match="key|string|integer|date" priority="1" >Di2015NewLine    <xsl:if test="local-name(self::node())='key'">Di2015NewLine      <xsl:variable name="keyName" select="translate(child::text(),' â‚¬â„¢','---')" />Di2015NewLine      <xsl:element name="{$keyName}" xmlns="http://www.tempuri.org/plist" >Di2015NewLine        <!-- removed on-the-fly; i had put this in while testingDi2015NewLine          <xsl:if test="local-name(following-sibling::node())='string'">Di2015NewLine        -->Di2015NewLine          <xsl:value-of select="following-sibling::node()" />Di2015NewLine        <!--Di2015NewLine          </xsl:if>Di2015NewLine        -->Di2015NewLine      </xsl:element>Di2015NewLine    </xsl:if>Di2015NewLine  </xsl:template>Di2015NewLine</xsl:stylesheet>Di2015NewLine

6641405Di2015UniqueSeparatortcpClient.Connected
6641405Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IsConnectedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //return _tcpClient != null && _tcpClient.Client != null && _tcpClient.Client.Connected;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_tcpClient != null && _tcpClient.Client != null && _tcpClient.Client.Connected)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                /* As the documentation:Di2015NewLine                    * When passing SelectMode.SelectRead as a parameter to the Poll method it will return Di2015NewLine                    * -either- true if Socket.Listen(Int32) has been called and a connection is pending;Di2015NewLine                    * -or- true if data is available for reading; Di2015NewLine                    * -or- true if the connection has been closed, reset, or terminated; Di2015NewLine                    * otherwise, returns falseDi2015NewLine                    */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Detect if client disconnectedDi2015NewLine                if (_tcpClient.Client.Poll(0, SelectMode.SelectRead))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    byte[] buff = new byte[1];Di2015NewLine                    if (_tcpClient.Client.Receive(buff, SocketFlags.Peek) == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Client disconnectedDi2015NewLine                        return false;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

       Di2015NewLine            table.Columns.Add("SourceCity");        Di2015NewLine            table.Columns.Add("DestinationCity");        Di2015NewLine            table.Columns.Add("Fare");        Di2015NewLine            table.Rows.Add(new object[] { "New York", "Las Vegas", "100" });        Di2015NewLine            root.InnerXml = writer.ToString();        Di2015NewLine            doc.AppendChild(root);        Di2015NewLine            return doc.CreateNavigator().Select("Root");    Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6645453Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic JsonResult GetChartData_IncidentsBySiteStatus(string SiteTypeId, string searchTextSite, string StartDate, string EndDate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        if (searchTextSite == null)Di2015NewLine                searchTextSite = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DateTime startDate = DateTime.Parse(StartDate);Di2015NewLine        DateTime endDate = DateTime.Parse(EndDate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var  incidentsQry = _db.Incidents;Di2015NewLine        if(SiteTypeId > -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            incidentsQry = incidentsQry.Where(a=>a.SiteTypeId == SiteTypeId);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var qry = from s in _db.Sites   Di2015NewLine                            join i in incidentsQry  on s.SiteId equals i.SiteIdDi2015NewLine                            where s.SiteDescription.Contains(searchTextSite)Di2015NewLine                                && (i.Entered >= startDate && i.Entered <= endDate)Di2015NewLine                            group s by s.SiteStatus.SiteStatusDescription + "[" + s.SiteTypeId.ToString() + "]"Di2015NewLine                                    into grpDi2015NewLine                                    select newDi2015NewLine                                    {Di2015NewLine                                            Site = grp.Key,Di2015NewLine                                            Count = grp.Count()Di2015NewLine                                    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Json(qry.ToList()  , JsonRequestBehavior.AllowGet);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6647557Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool[] Get_CharacterArray(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Declare the length of the array, all set to falseDi2015NewLine        bool[] characters = new bool[text.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the matching pointsDi2015NewLine        List<Point> wordLocs = FindMatchingTerms(text);Di2015NewLine        wordLocs.Sort(PointComparison);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int position = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (Point loc in wordLocs)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We're only setting the array for matched pointsDi2015NewLine            for (position = loc.X; position <= loc.Y; position++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                characters[position] = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return the arrayDi2015NewLine        return characters;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
6647557Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void RenderFormattedText(Graphics g, RectangleF bounds, string text, string matchText, Font font, Color colour, bool alignTextToTop)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                const string spaceCharacter = " ";Di2015NewLine                const string hyphenCharacter = "-";Di2015NewLine                Font fr = null;Di2015NewLine                Font fi = null;Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Get teh matching characters.Di2015NewLine                    bool[] charactersMatched = Get_CharacterArray(text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Setup the fonts and bounds.Di2015NewLine                    fr = new Font(font.FontFamily, font.Size, FontStyle.Regular);Di2015NewLine                    fi = new Font(font.FontFamily, font.Size, FontStyle.Bold | FontStyle.Underline);Di2015NewLine                    SizeF fontSize = g.MeasureString(text, fi, 0, StringFormat.GenericTypographic);Di2015NewLine                    RectangleF area = bounds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Loop all the characters of the phraseDi2015NewLine                    for (int pos = 0; pos < charactersMatched.Length; pos++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Draw the character in the appropriate style.Di2015NewLine                        string output = text.Substring(pos, 1);Di2015NewLine                        if (charactersMatched[pos])Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            area.X += DrawFormattedText(g, area, output, fi, colour);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            area.X += DrawFormattedText(g, area, output, fr, colour);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Are we towards the end of the line?Di2015NewLine                        if (area.X > (bounds.X + bounds.Width - 1))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // are we in the middle of a word?Di2015NewLine                            string preOutput = spaceCharacter;Di2015NewLine                            string postOutput = spaceCharacter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // Get at the previous character and after characterDi2015NewLine                            preOutput = text.Substring(pos - 1, 1);Di2015NewLine                            if ((pos + 1) <= text.Length)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                postOutput = text.Substring(pos + 1, 1);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // Are we in the middle of a word? if so, hyphen it!Di2015NewLine                            if (!preOutput.Equals(spaceCharacter) && !postOutput.Equals(spaceCharacter))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                if (charactersMatched[pos])Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    area.X += DrawFormattedText(g, area, hyphenCharacter, fi, colour);Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                elseDi2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    area.X += DrawFormattedText(g, area, hyphenCharacter, fr, colour);Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Are we at the end of the line?Di2015NewLine                        if (area.X > (bounds.X + bounds.Width))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            area.X = bounds.X;Di2015NewLine                            area.Y += fontSize.Height + 2;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    fr.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                    fi.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine
6647579Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic object ConvertSingleItem(string value, Type newType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (typeof(IConvertible).IsAssignableFrom(newType))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Convert.ChangeType(value, newType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // TODO: Add custom conversion for non IConvertible typesDi2015NewLine ConvertStringToNewNonNullableType(string value, Type newType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Do conversion form string to array - not sure how array will be stored in stringDi2015NewLine    if (newType.IsArray)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // For comma separated listDi2015NewLine        Type singleItemType = newType.GetElementType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var elements = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var element in value.Split(','))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var convertedSingleItem = ConvertSingleItem(element, singleItemType);Di2015NewLine            elements.Add(convertedSingleItem);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return elements.ToArray(singleItemType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ConvertSingleItem(value, newType);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic object ConvertStringToNewType(string value, Type newType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // If it's not a nullable type,
