NullableConverter(newType).UnderlyingType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ConvertStringToNewNonNullableType(value, newType);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic object CallMethod(object instance, MethodInfo methodInfo, Dictionary<string, string> parameters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var methodParameters = methodInfo.GetParameters();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var parametersForInvocation = new List<object>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var methodParameter in methodParameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string value;Di2015NewLine        if (parameters.TryGetValue(methodParameter.Name, out value))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var convertedValue = ConvertStringToNewType(value, methodParameter.ParameterType);Di2015NewLine            parametersForInvocation.Add(convertedValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get default value of the appropriate type or throw an exceptionDi2015NewLine            var defaultValue = Activator.CreateInstance(methodParameter.ParameterType);Di2015NewLine            parametersForInvocation.Add(defaultValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return methodInfo.Invoke(instance, parametersForInvocation.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6648833Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FactorAndMillimeterToPixelConverter : IMultiValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region IMultiValueConverter MemberDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object Convert(object[] values, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((values.Length < 2)Di2015NewLine            || !(values[0] is double?))Di2015NewLine            return Binding.DoNothing;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double? factor = (double?)values[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch(values.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case 2:Di2015NewLine                if(!(values[1] is double))Di2015NewLine                    return Binding.DoNothing;Di2015NewLine                // values[0]: Factor, values[1]: SizeMMDi2015NewLine                // if Factor is null, no fallback provided -> donothingDi2015NewLine                if (!factor.HasValue)Di2015NewLine                    return Binding.DoNothing;Di2015NewLine                // else return calculated widthDi2015NewLine                return factor.Value * (double)values[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case 3:Di2015NewLine                if (!(values[1] is double) || !(values[2] is double))Di2015NewLine                    return Binding.DoNothing;Di2015NewLine                // values[0]: Factor, values[1]: SizeMM, values[2]: SizePixelsFallbackDi2015NewLine                // if Factor is null, but fallback provided -> return fallbackDi2015NewLine                if (!factor.HasValue)Di2015NewLine                    return (double)values[2];Di2015NewLine                // else return calculated widthDi2015NewLine                return factor.Value * (double)values[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                // value.Length > 3Di2015NewLine                return Binding.DoNothing;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object[] ConvertBack(object value, Type[] targetTypes, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6658082Di2015UniqueSeparator    public virtual AppContext DeepClone()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //First do a shallow copy.Di2015NewLine        AppContext returnData = (AppContext)this.MemberwiseClone();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get the type.Di2015NewLine        Type type = returnData.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Now get all the member variables.Di2015NewLine        FieldInfo[] fieldInfoArray = type.GetFields();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Deepclone members that extend AppContext.Di2015NewLine        //This will ensure we get everything we need.Di2015NewLine        foreach (FieldInfo fieldInfo in fieldInfoArray)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //This gets the actual object in that field.Di2015NewLine            object sourceFieldValue = fieldInfo.GetValue(this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //See if this member is AppContextDi2015NewLine            if (sourceFieldValue is AppContext)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //If so, cast as a AppContext.Di2015NewLine                AppContext sourceAppContext = (AppContext)sourceFieldValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Create a clone of it.Di2015NewLine                AppContext clonedAppContext = sourceAppContext.DeepClone();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Within the cloned containig class.Di2015NewLine                fieldInfo.SetValue(returnData, clonedAppContext);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return returnData;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6659172Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected string GetPayPalURL(string SERVER_URL, string business, string[] itemNames,Di2015NewLine            int[] quantities, decimal[] amounts, double[] weight, string invoiceID, string transID, string NOTIFY_URL)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Customer will be required to specify delivery address to PayPal - VERY IMPORTANTDi2015NewLine            const string NO_SHIPPING = "2";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            StringBuilder url = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            url.Append(SERVER_URL + "?cmd=_cart&upload=1");Di2015NewLine            url.Append("&business=" + HttpUtility.UrlEncode(business));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < itemNames.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                url.Append("&item_name" + "_" + (i + 1).ToString() + "=" + HttpUtility.UrlEncode(itemNames[i]));Di2015NewLine                url.Append("&quantity" + "_" + (i + 1).ToString() + "=" + quantities[i].ToString().Replace(",", "."));Di2015NewLine                url.Append("&amount" + "_" + (i + 1).ToString() + "=" + amounts[i].ToString().Replace(",", "."));Di2015NewLine                url.Append("&weight" + "_" + (i + 1).ToString() + "=" + weight[i].ToString().Replace(",", "."));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            url.Append("&no_shipping=" + HttpUtility.UrlEncode(NO_SHIPPING));Di2015NewLine            url.Append("&custom=" + HttpUtility.UrlEncode(invoiceID));Di2015NewLine            url.Append("&txn_id=" + HttpUtility.UrlEncode(transID));Di2015NewLine            url.Append("&notify_url=" + HttpUtility.UrlEncode(NOTIFY_URL));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return url.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

6664213Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ListExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void MoveUp<T>(this List<T> list, T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = list.IndexOf(item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (index == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // item is not in the listDi2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("item");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (index == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // item is on topDi2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        list.Swap(index, index - 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void MoveDown<T>(this List<T> list, T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = list.IndexOf(item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (index == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // item is not in the listDi2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("item");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (index == list.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // item is no bottomDi2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        list.Swap(index, index + 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Swap<T>(this List<T> list, int i1, int i2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T temp = list[i1];Di2015NewLine        list[i1] = list[i2];Di2015NewLine        list[i2] = temp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6669045Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool ValueEquality<T1, T2>(T1 val1, T2 val2) Di2015NewLine    where T1 : IConvertible Di2015NewLine    where T2 : IConvertibleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // convert val2 to type of val1.Di2015NewLine    T1 boxed2 = (T1) Convert.ChangeType(val2, typeof (T1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // compare now that same type.Di2015NewLine    return val1.Equals(boxed2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6669045Di2015UniqueSeparator        Console.WriteLine(ValueEquality(1, "1"));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(ValueEquality(2, 2.0));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(ValueEquality(3, 3L));Di2015NewLine
6669045Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static bool ValueEquality(object val1, object val2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!(val1 is IConvertible)) throw new ArgumentException("val1 must be IConvertible type");Di2015NewLine        if (!(val2 is IConvertible)) throw new ArgumentException("val2 must be IConvertible type");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // convert val2 to type of val1.Di2015NewLine        var converted2 = Convert.ChangeType(val2, val1.GetType());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // compare now that same type.Di2015NewLine        return val1.Equals(converted2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
6669045Di2015UniqueSeparator        object obj1 = 1;Di2015NewLine        object obj2 = 1.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(ValueEquality(obj1, obj2));Di2015NewLine

6673673Di2015UniqueSeparator--Create tableDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE TABLE [dbo].[SQLData](Di2015NewLine    [Id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine    [Number1] [int] NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine    [Number2] [int] NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine    [Value] [int] NOT NULL,Di2015NewLineCONSTRAINT [PK_Multiplication] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([Id] ASC)) ON [PRIMARY]Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine--Populate table with dataDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET NOCOUNT ONDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDECLARE @OuterLoop INTDi2015NewLineDECLARE @InnerLoop INTDi2015NewLineSELECT @OuterLoop = 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineWHILE @OuterLoop <= 20 BEGINDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SELECT @InnerLoop = 1   Di2015NewLine    WHILE @InnerLoop <= 40 BEGINDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            INSERT INTO dbo.SQLData (Number1, Number2, Value)Di2015NewLine            VALUES (@OuterLoop, @InnerLoop, @OuterLoop * @InnerLoop)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SET @InnerLoop = @InnerLoop + 1Di2015NewLine    ENDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SET @OuterLoop = @OuterLoop + 1Di2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET NOCOUNT OFFDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine--Create stored procedureDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[FetchData]Di2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine        @StartIndex INTDi2015NewLine    ,   @EndIndex   INTDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SELECT  IdDi2015NewLine        ,   Number1Di2015NewLine        ,   Number2Di2015NewLine        ,   ValueDi2015NewLine    FROM    (Di2015NewLine                SELECT  RANK() OVER(ORDER BY Id) AS RowNumberDi2015NewLine                    ,   IdDi2015NewLine                    ,   Number1Di2015NewLine                    ,   Number2Di2015NewLine                    ,   Value Di2015NewLine                FROM    dbo.SQLDataDi2015NewLine            ) T1Di2015NewLine    WHERE   RowNumber BETWEEN @StartIndex AND @EndIndexDi2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLine

6676541Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DateTime GetFastestNISTDate()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = DateTime.MinValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Initialize the list of NIST time serversDi2015NewLine    // http://tf.nist.gov/tf-cgi/servers.cgiDi2015NewLine    string[] servers = new string[] {Di2015NewLine        "nist1-ny.ustiming.org",Di2015NewLine        "nist1-nj.ustiming.org",Di2015NewLine        "nist1-pa.ustiming.org",Di2015NewLine        "time-a.nist.gov",Di2015NewLine        "time-b.nist.gov",Di2015NewLine        "nist1.aol-va.symmetricom.com",Di2015NewLine        "nist1.columbiacountyga.gov",Di2015NewLine        "nist1-chi.ustiming.org",Di2015NewLine        "nist.expertsmi.com",Di2015NewLine        "nist.netservicesgroup.com"Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Try 5 servers in random order to spread the loadDi2015NewLine        Random rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine        foreach (string server in servers.OrderBy(s => rnd.NextDouble()).Take(5))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Connect to the server (at port 13) and get the responseDi2015NewLine                string serverResponse = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine                using (var reader = new StreamReader(new System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient(server, 13).GetStream()))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    serverResponse = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If a response was receivedDi2015NewLine                if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(serverResponse))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Split the response string ("55596 11-02-14 13:54:11 00 0 0 478.1 UTC(NIST) *")Di2015NewLine                    string[] tokens = serverResponse.Split(' ');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Check the number of tokensDi2015NewLine                    if (tokens.Length >= 6)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Check the health statusDi2015NewLine                        string health = tokens[5];Di2015NewLine                        if (health == "0")Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // Get date and time parts from the server responseDi2015NewLine                            string[] dateParts = tokens[1].Split('-');Di2015NewLine                            string[] timeParts = tokens[2].Split(':');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // Create a DateTime instanceDi2015NewLine                            DateTime utcDateTime = new DateTime(Di2015NewLine                                Convert.ToInt32(dateParts[0]) + 2000,Di2015NewLine                                Convert.ToInt32(dateParts[1]), Convert.ToInt32(dateParts[2]),Di2015NewLine                                Convert.ToInt32(timeParts[0]), Convert.ToInt32(timeParts[1]),Di2015NewLine                                Convert.ToInt32(timeParts[2]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // Convert received (UTC) DateTime value to the local timezoneDi2015NewLine                            result = utcDateTime.ToLocalTime();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            return result;Di2015NewLine                            // Response successfully received; exit the loopDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Ignore exception and try the next serverDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

return _streamToCapture.Read(buffer, offset, count);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override long Seek(long offset, SeekOrigin origin)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _streamToCapture.Seek(offset, origin);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override void SetLength(long value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _streamToCapture.SetLength(value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override void Write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region IHttpModule MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private HttpApplication _context;Di2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string Extensions_Key = "RequestResponseLoggerModule.Extensions";Di2015NewLine    private static string Files_Key = "RequestResponseLoggerModule.Files";Di2015NewLine    private static string Request_Key = "RequestResponseLoggerModule.Request";Di2015NewLine    private static string Response_Key = "RequestResponseLoggerModule.Response";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<string> _Extenstions = new string[] { };Di2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<string> _Files = new string[] { };Di2015NewLine    private bool _LogAlwaysRequest = false;Di2015NewLine    private bool _LogAlwaysResponse = false;Di2015NewLine    private bool _IsMatch = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Init(HttpApplication context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _Extenstions = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings[Extensions_Key].ToLower().Split(',').Di2015NewLine            Select(x => x.Trim()).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        _Files = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings[Files_Key].ToLower().Split(',').Di2015NewLine            Select(x => x.Trim()).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        _LogAlwaysRequest = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings[Request_Key] == "ALWAYS";Di2015NewLine        _LogAlwaysResponse = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings[Response_Key] == "ALWAYS";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _context = context;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        context.BeginRequest += new EventHandler(context_BeginRequest);Di2015NewLine        context.PreSendRequestContent += new EventHandler(context_PreSendRequestContent);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void context_PreRequestHandlerExecute(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _context.Response.Filter = new CaptureStream(_context.Response.Filter, _context.Response.ContentEncoding);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void {Di2015NewLine                using (Stream stream = System.IO.File.Open(fileName, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.ReadWrite, FileShare.ReadWrite))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (stream != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        System.Diagnostics.Trace.WriteLine(string.Format("Output file {0} ready.", fileName));Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (FileNotFoundException ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Diagnostics.Trace.WriteLine(string.Format("Output file {0} not yet ready ({1})", fileName, ex.Message));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch       }Di2015NewLine            catch (UnauthorizedAccessException ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Diagnostics.Trace.WriteLine(string.Format("Output file {0} not yet ready ({1})", fileName, ex.Message));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var configWatcher = new FileSystemWatcher(Path.GetDirectoryName(Path.GetFullPath("config.xml")), "config.xml");Di2015NewLine };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        configWatcher.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Thread t = new Thread((ThreadStart)(() => {Di2015NewLine            while       {Di2015NewLine                    _shouldReload = false;Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Reloading configuration.");Di2015NewLine }));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        t.IsBackground = true;Di2015NewLine        t.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        loadConfigAndRun();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        watcher.Changed += new FileSystemEventHandler(watcher_Changed);Di2015NewLine            watcher.Deleted += new FileSystemEventHandler(watcher_Changed);Di2015NewLine            watcher.Renamed }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void toggleWatcher(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var watcher = _watchers.FirstOrDefault(w => w.Path == path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 6682231Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Task sleeper = Task.Factory.StartNew(() => Thread.Sleep(100000));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int index = Task.WaitAny(new[] { sleeper },Di2015NewLine                                 TimeSpan.FromSeconds(0.5));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(index); // Prints -1, timeoutDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var cts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Just a simple wait of getting a cancellable taskDi2015NewLine        Task cancellable = sleeper.ContinueWith(ignored => {}, cts.Token);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // It doesn't matter that we cancel before the waitDi2015NewLine        cts.Cancel();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        index = Task.WaitAny(new[] { cancellable },Di2015NewLine                             TimeSpan.FromSeconds(0.5));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(index); // 0 - task 0  has completed (ish :)Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(cancellable.Status); // CancelledDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6687008Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DifferenceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Difference(string propertyPath, object value1, object value2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyPath = propertyPath;Di2015NewLine        Value1 = value1;Di2015NewLine        Value2 = value2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string PropertyPath { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public object Value1 { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public object Value2 { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Difference Extend(string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Difference(Di2015NewLine            string.Format("{0}.{1}", propertyName, PropertyPath), Value1, Value2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("{0}: {1}, {2}", PropertyPath, Value1, Value2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<Difference> GetDifferences<T>(T value1, T value2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetDifferences(typeof(T), value1, value2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // types in this collection are compared directlyDi2015NewLine    // and not recursively using their propertiesDi2015NewLine    private static readonly Type[] PrimitiveTypes =Di2015NewLine        new[] { typeof(int), typeof(string), typeof(DateTime) };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<Difference> GetDifferences(Di2015NewLine        Type type, object obj1, object obj2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var property inDi2015NewLine            type.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var val1 = property.GetValue(obj1, null);Di2015NewLine            var val2 = property.GetValue(obj2, null);Di2015NewLine            if (PrimitiveTypes.Contains(property.PropertyType))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!val1.Equals(val2))Di2015NewLine                    yield return new Difference(property.Name, val1, val2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var difference inDi2015NewLine                    GetDifferences(property.PropertyType, val1, val2))Di2015NewLine                    yield return difference.Extend(property.Name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6693692Di2015UniqueSeparator$test = gc $dl_fileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine$t = [Regex]::Matches($test, $regex, "IgnoreCase")Di2015NewLine$i = 0Di2015NewLineforeach ($tt in $t) { Di2015NewLine    # this assumes absolute paths - you may need to add the hostname if the paths are relativeDi2015NewLine    $url = $tt.Groups[1].Value.Trim() Di2015NewLine    $WebClient = New-Object System.Net.WebClientDi2015NewLine    $WebClient.UseDefaultCredentials = $trueDi2015NewLine    $WebClient.DownloadFile($url, $($path + $i + ".jpg"))Di2015NewLine    $i = $i + 1Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
